GV01rv_hn04u:1: RV_4,001.01a tvāṃ hy agne sadam it samanyavo devāso devam aratiṃ nyerira iti kratvā nyerire
GV01rv_hn04u:2: RV_4,001.01c amartyaṃ yajata martyeṣv ā devam ādevaṃ janata pracetasaṃ viśvam ādevaṃ janata pracetasam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:3: RV_4,001.02a sa bhrātaraṃ varuṇam agna ā vavṛtsva devāṃ acchā sumatī
GV01rv_hn04u:5: RV_4,001.02c ṛtāvānam ādityaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtaṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:6: RV_4,001.03a sakhe sakhāyam abhy ā vavṛtsvāśuṃ na cakraṃ rathyeva raṃhyāsmabhyaṃ dasma raṃhyā |
GV01rv_hn04u:7: RV_4,001.03c agne mṛḷīkaṃ varuṇe sacā vido marutsu viśvabhānuṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:8: RV_4,001.03d tokāya tuje śuśucāna śaṃ kṛdhy asmabhyaṃ dasma śaṃ kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:9: RV_4,001.04a tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḷo 'va yāsisīṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:10: RV_4,001.04c yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pra mumugdhy asmat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:11: RV_4,001.05a sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn04u:12: RV_4,001.05c ava yakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḷīkaṃ suhavo na edhi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:13: RV_4,001.06a asya śreṣṭhā subhagasya saṃdṛg devasya citratamā martyeṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:14: RV_4,001.06c śuci ghṛtaṃ na taptam aghnyāyā spārhā devasya maṃhaneva dhenoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:15: RV_4,001.07a trir asya tā paramā santi satyā spārhā devasya janimāny agneḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:16: RV_4,001.07c anante antaḥ parivīta āgāc chuciḥ śukro aryo rorucānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:17: RV_4,001.08a sa dūto viśved abhi vaṣṭi sadmā hotā hiraṇyaratho raṃsujihvaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:18: RV_4,001.08c rohidaśvo vapuṣyo vibhāvā sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatīva saṃsat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:19: RV_4,001.09a sa cetayan manuṣo yajñabandhuḥ pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti
GV01rv_hn04u:20: RV_4,001.09c sa kṣety asya duryāsu sādhan devo martasya sadhanitvam āpa ||
GV01rv_hn04u:21: RV_4,001.10a sa tū no agnir nayatu prajānann acchā ratnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yad asya |
GV01rv_hn04u:22: RV_4,001.10c dhiyā yad viśve amṛtā akṛṇvan dyauṣ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan
GV01rv_hn04u:23: RV_4,001.11a sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu maho budhne rajaso asya yonau |
GV01rv_hn04u:24: RV_4,001.11b apād aśīrṣā guhamāno antāyoyuvāno vṛṣabhasya nīḷe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:25: RV_4,001.12a pra śardha ārta prathamaṃ vipanyāṃ ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīḷe |
GV01rv_hn04u:26: RV_4,001.12c spārho yuvā vapuṣyo vibhāvā sapta priyāso 'janayanta vṛṣṇe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:27: RV_4,001.13a asmākam atra pitaro manuṣyā abhi pra sedur ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:28: RV_4,001.13c aśmavrajāḥ sudughā vavre antar ud usrā ājann uṣaso huvānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:29: RV_4,001.14a te marmṛjata dadṛvāṃso adriṃ tad eṣām anye abhito vi vocan |
GV01rv_hn04u:30: RV_4,001.14c paśvayantrāso abhi kāram arcan vidanta jyotiś cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:31: RV_4,001.15a te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdhaṃ gā yemānam pari ṣantam adrim
GV01rv_hn04u:32: RV_4,001.15c dṛḷhaṃ naro vacasā daivyena vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:33: RV_4,001.16a te manvata prathamaṃ nāma dhenos triḥ sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi
GV01rv_hn04u:35: RV_4,001.16c taj jānatīr abhy anūṣata vrā āvir bhuvad aruṇīr yaśasā goḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:36: RV_4,001.17a neśat tamo dudhitaṃ rocata dyaur ud devyā uṣaso bhānur arta |
GV01rv_hn04u:37: RV_4,001.17c ā sūryo bṛhatas tiṣṭhad ajrāṃ ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan ||
GV01rv_hn04u:38: RV_4,001.18a ād it paścā bubudhānā vy akhyann ād id ratnaṃ dhārayanta dyubhaktam |
GV01rv_hn04u:39: RV_4,001.18c viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devā mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu ||
GV01rv_hn04u:40: RV_4,001.19a acchā voceya śuśucānam agniṃ hotāraṃ viśvabharasaṃ yajiṣṭham
GV01rv_hn04u:41: RV_4,001.19c śucy ūdho atṛṇan na gavām andho na pūtam pariṣiktam aṃśoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:42: RV_4,001.20a viśveṣām aditir yajñiyānāṃ viśveṣām atithir mānuṣāṇām |
GV01rv_hn04u:43: RV_4,001.20c agnir devānām ava āvṛṇānaḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu jātavedāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:44: RV_4,002.01a yo martyeṣv amṛta ṛtāvā devo deveṣv aratir nidhāyi |
GV01rv_hn04u:45: RV_4,002.01c hotā yajiṣṭho mahnā śucadhyai havyair agnir manuṣa īrayadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn04u:46: RV_4,002.02a iha tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adya jāto jātāṃ ubhayāṃ antar agne |
GV01rv_hn04u:47: RV_4,002.02c dūta īyase yuyujāna ṛṣva ṛjumuṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrāṃś ca ||
GV01rv_hn04u:48: RV_4,002.03a atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣṭhā |
GV01rv_hn04u:49: RV_4,002.03c antar īyase aruṣā yujāno yuṣmāṃś ca devān viśa ā ca martān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:50: RV_4,002.04a aryamaṇaṃ varuṇam mitram eṣām indrāviṣṇū maruto aśvinota |
GV01rv_hn04u:51: RV_4,002.04c svaśvo agne surathaḥ surādhā ed u vaha suhaviṣe janāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:52: RV_4,002.05a gomāṃ agne 'vimāṃ aśvī yajño nṛvatsakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:53: RV_4,002.05c iḷāvāṃ eṣo asura prajāvān dīrgho rayiḥ pṛthubudhnaḥ sabhāvān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:54: RV_4,002.06a yas ta idhmaṃ jabharat siṣvidāno mūrdhānaṃ vā tatapate tvāyā
GV01rv_hn04u:55: RV_4,002.06c bhuvas tasya svatavāṃḥ pāyur agne viśvasmāt sīm aghāyata uruṣya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:56: RV_4,002.07a yas te bharād anniyate cid annaṃ niśiṣan mandram atithim
GV01rv_hn04u:58: RV_4,002.07c ā devayur inadhate duroṇe tasmin rayir dhruvo astu dāsvān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:59: RV_4,002.08a yas tvā doṣā ya uṣasi praśaṃsāt priyaṃ vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn04u:60: RV_4,002.08c aśvo na sve dama ā hemyāvān tam aṃhasaḥ pīparo dāśvāṃsam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:61: RV_4,002.09a yas tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśad duvas tve kṛṇavate yatasruk |
GV01rv_hn04u:62: RV_4,002.09c na sa rāyā śaśamāno vi yoṣan nainam aṃhaḥ pari varad aghāyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:63: RV_4,002.10a yasya tvam agne adhvaraṃ jujoṣo devo martasya sudhitaṃ rarāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:64: RV_4,002.10c prīted asad dhotrā sā yaviṣṭhāsāma yasya vidhato vṛdhāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:65: RV_4,002.11a cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān pṛṣṭheva vītā vṛjinā ca
GV01rv_hn04u:67: RV_4,002.11c rāye ca naḥ svapatyāya deva ditiṃ ca rāsvāditim uruṣya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:68: RV_4,002.12a kaviṃ śaśāsuḥ kavayo 'dabdhā nidhārayanto duryāsv āyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:69: RV_4,002.12c atas tvaṃ dṛśyāṃ agna etān paḍbhiḥ paśyer adbhutāṃ arya evaiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:70: RV_4,002.13a tvam agne vāghate supraṇītiḥ sutasomāya vidhate yaviṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn04u:71: RV_4,002.13c ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇiprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:72: RV_4,002.14a adhā ha yad vayam agne tvāyā paḍbhir hastebhiś cakṛmā
GV01rv_hn04u:74: RV_4,002.14c rathaṃ na kranto apasā bhurijor ṛtaṃ yemuḥ sudhya āśuṣāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:75: RV_4,002.15a adhā mātur uṣasaḥ sapta viprā jāyemahi prathamā vedhaso nṝn |
GV01rv_hn04u:76: RV_4,002.15c divas putrā aṅgiraso bhavemādriṃ rujema dhaninaṃ śucantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:77: RV_4,002.16a adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāso agna ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:78: RV_4,002.16c śucīd ayan dīdhitim ukthaśāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindanto aruṇīr apa vran ||
GV01rv_hn04u:79: RV_4,002.17a sukarmāṇaḥ suruco devayanto 'yo na devā janimā dhamantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:80: RV_4,002.17c śucanto agniṃ vavṛdhanta indram ūrvaṃ gavyam pariṣadanto agman ||
GV01rv_hn04u:81: RV_4,002.18a ā yūtheva kṣumati paśvo akhyad devānāṃ yaj janimānty ugra |
GV01rv_hn04u:82: RV_4,002.18c martānāṃ cid urvaśīr akṛpran vṛdhe cid arya uparasyāyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:83: RV_4,002.19a akarma te svapaso abhūma ṛtam avasrann uṣaso vibhātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:84: RV_4,002.19c anūnam agnim purudhā suścandraṃ devasya marmṛjataś cāru cakṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:85: RV_4,002.20a etā te agna ucathāni vedho 'vocāma kavaye tā juṣasva |
GV01rv_hn04u:86: RV_4,002.20c uc chocasva kṛṇuhi vasyaso no maho rāyaḥ puruvāra pra yandhi
GV01rv_hn04u:87: RV_4,003.01a ā vo rājānam adhvarasya rudraṃ hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:88: RV_4,003.01c agnim purā tanayitnor acittād dhiraṇyarūpam avase kṛṇudhvam
GV01rv_hn04u:89: RV_4,003.02a ayaṃ yoniś cakṛmā yaṃ vayaṃ te jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:90: RV_4,003.02c arvācīnaḥ parivīto ni ṣīdemā u te svapāka pratīcīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:91: RV_4,003.03a āśṛṇvate adṛpitāya manma nṛcakṣase sumṛḷīkāya vedhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:92: RV_4,003.03c devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṃsa grāveva sotā madhuṣud yam īḷe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:93: RV_4,003.04a tvaṃ cin naḥ śamyā agne asyā ṛtasya bodhy ṛtacit svādhīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:94: RV_4,003.04c kadā ta ukthā sadhamādyāni kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te ||
GV01rv_hn04u:95: RV_4,003.05a kathā ha tad varuṇāya tvam agne kathā dive garhase kan na āgaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:96: RV_4,003.05c kathā mitrāya mīḷhuṣe pṛthivyai bravaḥ kad aryamṇe kad bhagāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:97: RV_4,003.06a kad dhiṣṇyāsu vṛdhasāno agne kad vātāya pratavase śubhaṃye |
GV01rv_hn04u:98: RV_4,003.06c parijmane nāsatyāya kṣe bravaḥ kad agne rudrāya nṛghne ||
GV01rv_hn04u:99: RV_4,003.07a kathā mahe puṣṭimbharāya pūṣṇe kad rudrāya sumakhāya havirde |
GV01rv_hn04u:100: RV_4,003.07c kad viṣṇava urugāyāya reto bravaḥ kad agne śarave bṛhatyai ||
GV01rv_hn04u:101: RV_4,003.08a kathā śardhāya marutām ṛtāya kathā sūre bṛhate pṛcchyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:102: RV_4,003.08c prati bravo 'ditaye turāya sādhā divo jātavedaś cikitvān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:103: RV_4,003.09a ṛtena ṛtaṃ niyatam īḷa ā gor āmā sacā madhumat pakvam agne |
GV01rv_hn04u:104: RV_4,003.09c kṛṣṇā satī ruśatā dhāsinaiṣā jāmaryeṇa payasā pīpāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:105: RV_4,003.10a ṛtena hi ṣmā vṛṣabhaś cid aktaḥ pumāṃ agniḥ payasā pṛṣṭhyena
GV01rv_hn04u:106: RV_4,003.10c aspandamāno acarad vayodhā vṛṣā śukraṃ duduhe pṛśnir ūdhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:107: RV_4,003.11a ṛtenādriṃ vy asan bhidantaḥ sam aṅgiraso navanta gobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:108: RV_4,003.11c śunaṃ naraḥ pari ṣadann uṣāsam āviḥ svar abhavaj jāte agnau
GV01rv_hn04u:109: RV_4,003.12a ṛtena devīr amṛtā amṛktā arṇobhir āpo madhumadbhir agne |
GV01rv_hn04u:110: RV_4,003.12c vājī na sargeṣu prastubhānaḥ pra sadam it sravitave dadhanyuḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:111: RV_4,003.13a mā kasya yakṣaṃ sadam id dhuro gā mā veśasya praminato māpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:112: RV_4,003.13c mā bhrātur agne anṛjor ṛṇaṃ ver mā sakhyur dakṣaṃ ripor bhujema ||
GV01rv_hn04u:113: RV_4,003.14a rakṣā ṇo agne tava rakṣaṇebhī rārakṣāṇaḥ sumakha prīṇānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:114: RV_4,003.14c prati ṣphura vi ruja vīḍv aṃho jahi rakṣo mahi cid vāvṛdhānam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:115: RV_4,003.15a ebhir bhava sumanā agne arkair imān spṛśa manmabhiḥ śūra
GV01rv_hn04u:117: RV_4,003.15c uta brahmāṇy aṅgiro juṣasva saṃ te śastir devavātā jareta ||
GV01rv_hn04u:118: RV_4,003.16a etā viśvā viduṣe tubhyaṃ vedho nīthāny agne niṇyā vacāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn04u:119: RV_4,003.16c nivacanā kavaye kāvyāny aśaṃsiṣam matibhir vipra ukthaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:120: RV_4,004.01a kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīṃ yāhi rājevāmavāṃ ibhena |
GV01rv_hn04u:121: RV_4,004.01c tṛṣvīm anu prasitiṃ drūṇāno 'stāsi vidhya rakṣasas tapiṣṭhaiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:122: RV_4,004.02a tava bhramāsa āśuyā patanty anu spṛśa dhṛṣatā śośucānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:123: RV_4,004.02c tapūṃṣy agne juhvā pataṅgān asaṃdito vi sṛja viṣvag ulkāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:124: RV_4,004.03a prati spaśo vi sṛja tūrṇitamo bhavā pāyur viśo asyā adabdhaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:125: RV_4,004.03c yo no dūre aghaśaṃso yo anty agne mākiṣ ṭe vyathir ā dadharṣīt ||
GV01rv_hn04u:126: RV_4,004.04a ud agne tiṣṭha praty ā tanuṣva ny amitrāṃ oṣatāt tigmahete |
GV01rv_hn04u:127: RV_4,004.04c yo no arātiṃ samidhāna cakre nīcā taṃ dhakṣy atasaṃ na śuṣkam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:128: RV_4,004.05a ūrdhvo bhava prati vidhyādhy asmad āviṣ kṛṇuṣva daivyāny agne
GV01rv_hn04u:129: RV_4,004.05c ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnāṃ jāmim ajāmim pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn ||
GV01rv_hn04u:130: RV_4,004.06a sa te jānāti sumatiṃ yaviṣṭha ya īvate brahmaṇe gātum airat |
GV01rv_hn04u:131: RV_4,004.06c viśvāny asmai sudināni rāyo dyumnāny aryo vi duro abhi dyaut
GV01rv_hn04u:132: RV_4,004.07a sed agne astu subhagaḥ sudānur yas tvā nityena haviṣā ya ukthaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:133: RV_4,004.07c piprīṣati sva āyuṣi duroṇe viśved asmai sudinā sāsad iṣṭiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:134: RV_4,004.08a arcāmi te sumatiṃ ghoṣy arvāk saṃ te vāvātā jaratām iyaṃ gīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:135: RV_4,004.08c svaśvās tvā surathā marjayemāsme kṣatrāṇi dhārayer anu dyūn ||
GV01rv_hn04u:136: RV_4,004.09a iha tvā bhūry ā cared upa tman doṣāvastar dīdivāṃsam anu dyūn |
GV01rv_hn04u:137: RV_4,004.09c krīḷantas tvā sumanasaḥ sapemābhi dyumnā tasthivāṃso janānām
GV01rv_hn04u:138: RV_4,004.10a yas tvā svaśvaḥ suhiraṇyo agna upayāti vasumatā rathena |
GV01rv_hn04u:139: RV_4,004.10c tasya trātā bhavasi tasya sakhā yas ta ātithyam ānuṣag
GV01rv_hn04u:141: RV_4,004.11a maho rujāmi bandhutā vacobhis tan mā pitur gotamād anv iyāya
GV01rv_hn04u:142: RV_4,004.11c tvaṃ no asya vacasaś cikiddhi hotar yaviṣṭha sukrato damūnāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:143: RV_4,004.12a asvapnajas taraṇayaḥ suśevā atandrāso 'vṛkā aśramiṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:144: RV_4,004.12c te pāyavaḥ sadhryañco niṣadyāgne tava naḥ pāntv amūra ||
GV01rv_hn04u:145: RV_4,004.13a ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan |
GV01rv_hn04u:146: RV_4,004.13c rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:147: RV_4,004.14a tvayā vayaṃ sadhanyas tvotās tava praṇīty aśyāma vājān |
GV01rv_hn04u:148: RV_4,004.14c ubhā śaṃsā sūdaya satyatāte 'nuṣṭhuyā kṛṇuhy ahrayāṇa ||
GV01rv_hn04u:149: RV_4,004.15a ayā te agne samidhā vidhema prati stomaṃ śasyamānaṃ gṛbhāya |
GV01rv_hn04u:150: RV_4,004.15c dahāśaso rakṣasaḥ pāhy asmān druho nido mitramaho avadyāt ||
GV01rv_hn04u:151: RV_4,005.01a vaiśvānarāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ kathā dāśemāgnaye bṛhad bhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:152: RV_4,005.01c anūnena bṛhatā vakṣathenopa stabhāyad upamin na rodhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:153: RV_4,005.02a mā nindata ya imām mahyaṃ rātiṃ devo dadau martyāya svadhāvān
GV01rv_hn04u:154: RV_4,005.02c pākāya gṛtso amṛto vicetā vaiśvānaro nṛtamo yahvo agniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:155: RV_4,005.03a sāma dvibarhā mahi tigmabhṛṣṭiḥ sahasraretā vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān
GV01rv_hn04u:156: RV_4,005.03c padaṃ na gor apagūḷhaṃ vividvān agnir mahyam pred u vocan manīṣām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:157: RV_4,005.04a pra tāṃ agnir babhasat tigmajambhas tapiṣṭhena śociṣā yaḥ surādhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:158: RV_4,005.04c pra ye minanti varuṇasya dhāma priyā mitrasya cetato dhruvāṇi
GV01rv_hn04u:159: RV_4,005.05a abhrātaro na yoṣaṇo vyantaḥ patiripo na janayo durevāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:160: RV_4,005.05c pāpāsaḥ santo anṛtā asatyā idam padam ajanatā gabhīram ||
GV01rv_hn04u:161: RV_4,005.06a idam me agne kiyate pāvakāminate gurum bhāraṃ na manma |
GV01rv_hn04u:162: RV_4,005.06c bṛhad dadhātha dhṛṣatā gabhīraṃ yahvam pṛṣṭham prayasā saptadhātu ||
GV01rv_hn04u:163: RV_4,005.07a tam in nv eva samanā samānam abhi kratvā punatī dhītir aśyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:164: RV_4,005.07c sasasya carmann adhi cāru pṛśner agre rupa ārupitaṃ jabāru ||
GV01rv_hn04u:165: RV_4,005.08a pravācyaṃ vacasaḥ kim me asya guhā hitam upa niṇig vadanti |
GV01rv_hn04u:166: RV_4,005.08c yad usriyāṇām apa vār iva vran pāti priyaṃ rupo agram padaṃ veḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:167: RV_4,005.09a idam u tyan mahi mahām anīkaṃ yad usriyā sacata pūrvyaṃ gauḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:168: RV_4,005.09c ṛtasya pade adhi dīdyānaṃ guhā raghuṣyad raghuyad viveda ||
GV01rv_hn04u:169: RV_4,005.10a adha dyutānaḥ pitroḥ sacāsāmanuta guhyaṃ cāru pṛśneḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:170: RV_4,005.10c mātuṣ pade parame anti ṣad gor vṛṣṇaḥ śociṣaḥ prayatasya
GV01rv_hn04u:172: RV_4,005.11a ṛtaṃ voce namasā pṛcchyamānas tavāśasā jātavedo yadīdam |
GV01rv_hn04u:173: RV_4,005.11c tvam asya kṣayasi yad dha viśvaṃ divi yad u draviṇaṃ yat pṛthivyām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:174: RV_4,005.12a kiṃ no asya draviṇaṃ kad dha ratnaṃ vi no voco jātavedaś cikitvān |
GV01rv_hn04u:175: RV_4,005.12c guhādhvanaḥ paramaṃ yan no asya reku padaṃ na nidānā aganma
GV01rv_hn04u:176: RV_4,005.13a kā maryādā vayunā kad dha vāmam acchā gamema raghavo na vājam |
GV01rv_hn04u:177: RV_4,005.13c kadā no devīr amṛtasya patnīḥ sūro varṇena tatanann uṣāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:178: RV_4,005.14a anireṇa vacasā phalgvena pratītyena kṛdhunātṛpāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:179: RV_4,005.14c adhā te agne kim ihā vadanty anāyudhāsa āsatā sacantām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:180: RV_4,005.15a asya śriye samidhānasya vṛṣṇo vasor anīkaṃ dama ā ruroca |
GV01rv_hn04u:181: RV_4,005.15c ruśad vasānaḥ sudṛśīkarūpaḥ kṣitir na rāyā puruvāro adyaut ||
GV01rv_hn04u:182: RV_4,006.01a ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇo adhvarasya hotar agne tiṣṭha devatātā yajīyān
GV01rv_hn04u:183: RV_4,006.01c tvaṃ hi viśvam abhy asi manma pra vedhasaś cit tirasi manīṣām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:184: RV_4,006.02a amūro hotā ny asādi vikṣv agnir mandro vidatheṣu pracetāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:185: RV_4,006.02c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitevāśren meteva dhūmaṃ stabhāyad upa dyām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:186: RV_4,006.03a yatā sujūrṇī rātinī ghṛtācī pradakṣiṇid devatātim urāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:187: RV_4,006.03c ud u svarur navajā nākraḥ paśvo anakti sudhitaḥ sumekaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:188: RV_4,006.04a stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnā ūrdhvo adhvaryur jujuṣāṇo asthāt |
GV01rv_hn04u:189: RV_4,006.04c pary agniḥ paśupā na hotā triviṣṭy eti pradiva urāṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:190: RV_4,006.05a pari tmanā mitadrur eti hotāgnir mandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:191: RV_4,006.05c dravanty asya vājino na śokā bhayante viśvā bhuvanā yad
GV01rv_hn04u:193: RV_4,006.06a bhadrā te agne svanīka saṃdṛg ghorasya sato viṣuṇasya cāruḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:194: RV_4,006.06c na yat te śocis tamasā varanta na dhvasmānas tanvī repa ā dhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:195: RV_4,006.07a na yasya sātur janitor avāri na mātarāpitarā nū cid iṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn04u:196: RV_4,006.07c adhā mitro na sudhitaḥ pāvako 'gnir dīdāya mānuṣīṣu vikṣu ||
GV01rv_hn04u:197: RV_4,006.08a dvir yam pañca jījanan saṃvasānāḥ svasāro agnim mānuṣīṣu vikṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:198: RV_4,006.08c uṣarbudham atharyo na dantaṃ śukraṃ svāsam paraśuṃ na tigmam
GV01rv_hn04u:199: RV_4,006.09a tava tye agne harito ghṛtasnā rohitāsa ṛjvañcaḥ svañcaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:200: RV_4,006.09c aruṣāso vṛṣaṇa ṛjumuṣkā ā devatātim ahvanta dasmāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:201: RV_4,006.10a ye ha tye te sahamānā ayāsas tveṣāso agne arcayaś caranti |
GV01rv_hn04u:202: RV_4,006.10c śyenāso na duvasanāso arthaṃ tuviṣvaṇaso mārutaṃ na śardhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:203: RV_4,006.11a akāri brahma samidhāna tubhyaṃ śaṃsāty ukthaṃ yajate vy ū
GV01rv_hn04u:205: RV_4,006.11c hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur namasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:206: RV_4,007.01a ayam iha prathamo dhāyi dhātṛbhir hotā yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:207: RV_4,007.01c yam apnavāno bhṛgavo virurucur vaneṣu citraṃ vibhvaṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:209: RV_4,007.02a agne kadā ta ānuṣag bhuvad devasya cetanam |
GV01rv_hn04u:210: RV_4,007.02c adhā hi tvā jagṛbhrire martāso vikṣv īḍyam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:211: RV_4,007.03a ṛtāvānaṃ vicetasam paśyanto dyām iva stṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:213: RV_4,007.04a āśuṃ dūtaṃ vivasvato viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhi |
GV01rv_hn04u:214: RV_4,007.04c ā jabhruḥ ketum āyavo bhṛgavāṇaṃ viśe-viśe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:215: RV_4,007.05a tam īṃ hotāram ānuṣak cikitvāṃsaṃ ni ṣedire |
GV01rv_hn04u:216: RV_4,007.05c raṇvam pāvakaśociṣaṃ yajiṣṭhaṃ sapta dhāmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:217: RV_4,007.06a taṃ śaśvatīṣu mātṛṣu vana ā vītam aśritam |
GV01rv_hn04u:218: RV_4,007.06c citraṃ santaṃ guhā hitaṃ suvedaṃ kūcidarthinam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:219: RV_4,007.07a sasasya yad viyutā sasminn ūdhann ṛtasya dhāman raṇayanta devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:220: RV_4,007.07c mahāṃ agnir namasā rātahavyo ver adhvarāya sadam id ṛtāvā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:221: RV_4,007.08a ver adhvarasya dūtyāni vidvān ubhe antā rodasī saṃcikitvān |
GV01rv_hn04u:222: RV_4,007.08c dūta īyase pradiva urāṇo viduṣṭaro diva ārodhanāni ||
GV01rv_hn04u:223: RV_4,007.09a kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśataḥ puro bhāś cariṣṇv arcir vapuṣām id ekam |
GV01rv_hn04u:224: RV_4,007.09c yad apravītā dadhate ha garbhaṃ sadyaś cij jāto bhavasīd u dūtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:225: RV_4,007.10a sadyo jātasya dadṛśānam ojo yad asya vāto anuvāti śociḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:226: RV_4,007.10c vṛṇakti tigmām ataseṣu jihvāṃ sthirā cid annā dayate vi
GV01rv_hn04u:228: RV_4,007.11a tṛṣu yad annā tṛṣuṇā vavakṣa tṛṣuṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇute yahvo agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:229: RV_4,007.11c vātasya meḷiṃ sacate nijūrvann āśuṃ na vājayate hinve arvā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:230: RV_4,008.01a dūtaṃ vo viśvavedasaṃ havyavāham amartyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:232: RV_4,008.02a sa hi vedā vasudhitim mahāṃ ārodhanaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:234: RV_4,008.03a sa veda deva ānamaṃ devāṃ ṛtāyate dame |
GV01rv_hn04u:236: RV_4,008.04a sa hotā sed u dūtyaṃ cikitvāṃ antar īyate |
GV01rv_hn04u:238: RV_4,008.05a te syāma ye agnaye dadāśur havyadātibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:240: RV_4,008.06a te rāyā te suvīryaiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire |
GV01rv_hn04u:242: RV_4,008.07a asme rāyo dive-dive saṃ carantu puruspṛhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:244: RV_4,008.08a sa vipraś carṣaṇīnāṃ śavasā mānuṣāṇām |
GV01rv_hn04u:246: RV_4,009.01a agne mṛḷa mahāṃ asi ya īm ā devayuṃ janam |
GV01rv_hn04u:248: RV_4,009.02a sa mānuṣīṣu dūḷabho vikṣu prāvīr amartyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:250: RV_4,009.03a sa sadma pari ṇīyate hotā mandro diviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:252: RV_4,009.04a uta gnā agnir adhvara uto gṛhapatir dame |
GV01rv_hn04u:254: RV_4,009.05a veṣi hy adhvarīyatām upavaktā janānām |
GV01rv_hn04u:256: RV_4,009.06a veṣīd v asya dūtyaṃ yasya jujoṣo adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn04u:258: RV_4,009.07a asmākaṃ joṣy adhvaram asmākaṃ yajñam aṅgiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:260: RV_4,009.08a pari te dūḷabho ratho 'smāṃ aśnotu viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:262: RV_4,010.01a agne tam adyāśvaṃ na stomaiḥ kratuṃ na bhadraṃ hṛdispṛśam |
GV01rv_hn04u:264: RV_4,010.02a adhā hy agne krator bhadrasya dakṣasya sādhoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:266: RV_4,010.03a ebhir no arkair bhavā no arvāṅ svar ṇa jyotiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:268: RV_4,010.04a ābhiṣ ṭe adya gīrbhir gṛṇanto 'gne dāśema |
GV01rv_hn04u:269: RV_4,010.04c pra te divo na stanayanti śuṣmāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:270: RV_4,010.05a tava svādiṣṭhāgne saṃdṛṣṭir idā cid ahna idā cid aktoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:271: RV_4,010.05c śriye rukmo na rocata upāke ||
GV01rv_hn04u:272: RV_4,010.06a ghṛtaṃ na pūtaṃ tanūr arepāḥ śuci hiraṇyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:273: RV_4,010.06c tat te rukmo na rocata svadhāvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:274: RV_4,010.07a kṛtaṃ cid dhi ṣmā sanemi dveṣo 'gna inoṣi martāt |
GV01rv_hn04u:276: RV_4,010.08a śivā naḥ sakhyā santu bhrātrāgne deveṣu yuṣme |
GV01rv_hn04u:277: RV_4,010.08c sā no nābhiḥ sadane sasminn ūdhan ||
GV01rv_hn04u:278: RV_4,011.01a bhadraṃ te agne sahasinn anīkam upāka ā rocate sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn04u:279: RV_4,011.01c ruśad dṛśe dadṛśe naktayā cid arūkṣitaṃ dṛśa ā rūpe annam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:280: RV_4,011.02a vi ṣāhy agne gṛṇate manīṣāṃ khaṃ vepasā tuvijāta stavānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:281: RV_4,011.02c viśvebhir yad vāvanaḥ śukra devais tan no rāsva sumaho bhūri manma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:282: RV_4,011.03a tvad agne kāvyā tvan manīṣās tvad ukthā jāyante rādhyāni |
GV01rv_hn04u:283: RV_4,011.03c tvad eti draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā itthādhiye dāśuṣe martyāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:284: RV_4,011.04a tvad vājī vājambharo vihāyā abhiṣṭikṛj jāyate satyaśuṣmaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:285: RV_4,011.04c tvad rayir devajūto mayobhus tvad āśur jūjuvāṃ agne arvā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:286: RV_4,011.05a tvām agne prathamaṃ devayanto devam martā amṛta mandrajihvam |
GV01rv_hn04u:287: RV_4,011.05c dveṣoyutam ā vivāsanti dhībhir damūnasaṃ gṛhapatim amūram ||
GV01rv_hn04u:288: RV_4,011.06a āre asmad amatim āre aṃha āre viśvāṃ durmatiṃ yan nipāsi |
GV01rv_hn04u:289: RV_4,011.06c doṣā śivaḥ sahasaḥ sūno agne yaṃ deva ā cit sacase svasti ||
GV01rv_hn04u:290: RV_4,012.01a yas tvām agna inadhate yatasruk tris te annaṃ kṛṇavat sasminn ahan |
GV01rv_hn04u:291: RV_4,012.01c sa su dyumnair abhy astu prasakṣat tava kratvā jātavedaś
GV01rv_hn04u:293: RV_4,012.02a idhmaṃ yas te jabharac chaśramāṇo maho agne anīkam ā saparyan
GV01rv_hn04u:294: RV_4,012.02c sa idhānaḥ prati doṣām uṣāsam puṣyan rayiṃ sacate ghnann
GV01rv_hn04u:296: RV_4,012.03a agnir īśe bṛhataḥ kṣatriyasyāgnir vājasya paramasya rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:297: RV_4,012.03c dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate yaviṣṭho vy ānuṣaṅ martyāya svadhāvān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:298: RV_4,012.04a yac cid dhi te puruṣatrā yaviṣṭhācittibhiś cakṛmā kac cid
GV01rv_hn04u:300: RV_4,012.04c kṛdhī ṣv asmāṃ aditer anāgān vy enāṃsi śiśratho viṣvag agne
GV01rv_hn04u:301: RV_4,012.05a mahaś cid agna enaso abhīka ūrvād devānām uta martyānām |
GV01rv_hn04u:302: RV_4,012.05c mā te sakhāyaḥ sadam id riṣāma yacchā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:303: RV_4,012.06a yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:304: RV_4,012.06c evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:305: RV_4,013.01a praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyad vibhātīnāṃ sumanā ratnadheyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:306: RV_4,013.01c yātam aśvinā sukṛto duroṇam ut sūryo jyotiṣā deva eti ||
GV01rv_hn04u:307: RV_4,013.02a ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred drapsaṃ davidhvad gaviṣo na
GV01rv_hn04u:309: RV_4,013.02c anu vrataṃ varuṇo yanti mitro yat sūryaṃ divy ārohayanti ||
GV01rv_hn04u:310: RV_4,013.03a yaṃ sīm akṛṇvan tamase vipṛce dhruvakṣemā anavasyanto artham |
GV01rv_hn04u:311: RV_4,013.03c taṃ sūryaṃ haritaḥ sapta yahvī spaśaṃ viśvasya jagato vahanti
GV01rv_hn04u:312: RV_4,013.04a vahiṣṭhebhir viharan yāsi tantum avavyayann asitaṃ deva vasma |
GV01rv_hn04u:313: RV_4,013.04c davidhvato raśmayaḥ sūryasya carmevāvādhus tamo apsv antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:314: RV_4,013.05a anāyato anibaddhaḥ kathāyaṃ nyaṅṅ uttāno 'va padyate na |
GV01rv_hn04u:315: RV_4,013.05c kayā yāti svadhayā ko dadarśa diva skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti
GV01rv_hn04u:317: RV_4,014.01a praty agnir uṣaso jātavedā akhyad devo rocamānā mahobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:318: RV_4,014.01c ā nāsatyorugāyā rathenemaṃ yajñam upa no yātam accha ||
GV01rv_hn04u:319: RV_4,014.02a ūrdhvaṃ ketuṃ savitā devo aśrej jyotir viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvan |
GV01rv_hn04u:320: RV_4,014.02c āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ vi sūryo raśmibhiś cekitānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:321: RV_4,014.03a āvahanty aruṇīr jyotiṣāgān mahī citrā raśmibhiś cekitānā |
GV01rv_hn04u:322: RV_4,014.03c prabodhayantī suvitāya devy uṣā īyate suyujā rathena ||
GV01rv_hn04u:323: RV_4,014.04a ā vāṃ vahiṣṭhā iha te vahantu rathā aśvāsa uṣaso vyuṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn04u:324: RV_4,014.04c ime hi vām madhupeyāya somā asmin yajñe vṛṣaṇā mādayethām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:325: RV_4,014.05a anāyato anibaddhaḥ kathāyaṃ nyaṅṅ uttāno 'va padyate na |
GV01rv_hn04u:326: RV_4,014.05c kayā yāti svadhayā ko dadarśa diva skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti
GV01rv_hn04u:328: RV_4,015.01a agnir hotā no adhvare vājī san pari ṇīyate |
GV01rv_hn04u:330: RV_4,015.02a pari triviṣṭy adhvaraṃ yāty agnī rathīr iva |
GV01rv_hn04u:332: RV_4,015.03a pari vājapatiḥ kavir agnir havyāny akramīt |
GV01rv_hn04u:334: RV_4,015.04a ayaṃ yaḥ sṛñjaye puro daivavāte samidhyate |
GV01rv_hn04u:336: RV_4,015.05a asya ghā vīra īvato 'gner īśīta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:338: RV_4,015.06a tam arvantaṃ na sānasim aruṣaṃ na divaḥ śiśum |
GV01rv_hn04u:340: RV_4,015.07a bodhad yan mā haribhyāṃ kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:341: RV_4,015.07c acchā na hūta ud aram ||
GV01rv_hn04u:342: RV_4,015.08a uta tyā yajatā harī kumārāt sāhadevyāt |
GV01rv_hn04u:344: RV_4,015.09a eṣa vāṃ devāv aśvinā kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:346: RV_4,015.10a taṃ yuvaṃ devāv aśvinā kumāraṃ sāhadevyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:348: RV_4,016.01a ā satyo yātu maghavāṃ ṛjīṣī dravantv asya haraya upa naḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:349: RV_4,016.01c tasmā id andhaḥ suṣumā sudakṣam ihābhipitvaṃ karate gṛṇānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:350: RV_4,016.02a ava sya śūrādhvano nānte 'smin no adya savane mandadhyai |
GV01rv_hn04u:351: RV_4,016.02c śaṃsāty uktham uśaneva vedhāś cikituṣe asuryāya manma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:352: RV_4,016.03a kavir na niṇyaṃ vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekaṃ vipipāno
GV01rv_hn04u:354: RV_4,016.03c diva itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cic cakrur vayunā
GV01rv_hn04u:356: RV_4,016.04a svar yad vedi sudṛśīkam arkair mahi jyotī rurucur yad dha vastoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:357: RV_4,016.04c andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaś cakāra nṛtamo abhiṣṭau ||
GV01rv_hn04u:358: RV_4,016.05a vavakṣa indro amitam ṛjīṣy ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:359: RV_4,016.05c ataś cid asya mahimā vi recy abhi yo viśvā bhuvanā babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn04u:360: RV_4,016.06a viśvāni śakro naryāṇi vidvān apo rireca sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:361: RV_4,016.06c aśmānaṃ cid ye bibhidur vacobhir vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi
GV01rv_hn04u:363: RV_4,016.07a apo vṛtraṃ vavrivāṃsam parāhan prāvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:364: RV_4,016.07c prārṇāṃsi samudriyāṇy ainoḥ patir bhavañ chavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo ||
GV01rv_hn04u:365: RV_4,016.08a apo yad adrim puruhūta dardar āvir bhuvat saramā pūrvyaṃ te |
GV01rv_hn04u:366: RV_4,016.08c sa no netā vājam ā darṣi bhūriṃ gotrā rujann aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:367: RV_4,016.09a acchā kaviṃ nṛmaṇo gā abhiṣṭau svarṣātā maghavan nādhamānam |
GV01rv_hn04u:368: RV_4,016.09c ūtibhis tam iṣaṇo dyumnahūtau ni māyāvān abrahmā dasyur arta
GV01rv_hn04u:369: RV_4,016.10a ā dasyughnā manasā yāhy astam bhuvat te kutsaḥ sakhye nikāmaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:370: RV_4,016.10c sve yonau ni ṣadataṃ sarūpā vi vāṃ cikitsad ṛtacid dha nārī ||
GV01rv_hn04u:371: RV_4,016.11a yāsi kutsena saratham avasyus todo vātasya haryor īśānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:372: RV_4,016.11c ṛjrā vājaṃ na gadhyaṃ yuyūṣan kavir yad ahan pāryāya bhūṣāt
GV01rv_hn04u:373: RV_4,016.12a kutsāya śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ ni barhīḥ prapitve ahnaḥ kuyavaṃ sahasrā |
GV01rv_hn04u:374: RV_4,016.12c sadyo dasyūn pra mṛṇa kutsyena pra sūraś cakraṃ vṛhatād
GV01rv_hn04u:376: RV_4,016.13a tvam piprum mṛgayaṃ śūśuvāṃsam ṛjiśvane vaidathināya randhīḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:377: RV_4,016.13c pañcāśat kṛṣṇā ni vapaḥ sahasrātkaṃ na puro jarimā vi dardaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:378: RV_4,016.14a sūra upāke tanvaṃ dadhāno vi yat te cety amṛtasya varpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:379: RV_4,016.14c mṛgo na hastī taviṣīm uṣāṇaḥ siṃho na bhīma āyudhāni bibhrat
GV01rv_hn04u:380: RV_4,016.15a indraṃ kāmā vasūyanto agman svarmīḷhe na savane cakānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:381: RV_4,016.15c śravasyavaḥ śaśamānāsa ukthair oko na raṇvā sudṛśīva puṣṭiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:382: RV_4,016.16a tam id va indraṃ suhavaṃ huvema yas tā cakāra naryā purūṇi |
GV01rv_hn04u:383: RV_4,016.16c yo māvate jaritre gadhyaṃ cin makṣū vājam bharati spārharādhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:384: RV_4,016.17a tigmā yad antar aśaniḥ patāti kasmiñ cic chūra muhuke janānām
GV01rv_hn04u:385: RV_4,016.17c ghorā yad arya samṛtir bhavāty adha smā nas tanvo bodhi gopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:386: RV_4,016.18a bhuvo 'vitā vāmadevasya dhīnām bhuvaḥ sakhāvṛko vājasātau |
GV01rv_hn04u:387: RV_4,016.18c tvām anu pramatim ā jaganmoruśaṃso jaritre viśvadha syāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:388: RV_4,016.19a ebhir nṛbhir indra tvāyubhiṣ ṭvā maghavadbhir maghavan viśva ājau |
GV01rv_hn04u:389: RV_4,016.19c dyāvo na dyumnair abhi santo aryaḥ kṣapo madema śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:390: RV_4,016.20a eved indrāya vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe brahmākarma bhṛgavo na ratham |
GV01rv_hn04u:391: RV_4,016.20c nū cid yathā naḥ sakhyā viyoṣad asan na ugro 'vitā tanūpāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:392: RV_4,016.21a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:393: RV_4,016.21c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:394: RV_4,017.01a tvam mahāṃ indra tubhyaṃ ha kṣā anu kṣatram maṃhanā manyata dyauḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:395: RV_4,017.01c tvaṃ vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghanvān sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:396: RV_4,017.02a tava tviṣo janiman rejata dyau rejad bhūmir bhiyasā svasya
GV01rv_hn04u:398: RV_4,017.02c ṛghāyanta subhvaḥ parvatāsa ārdan dhanvāni sarayanta āpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:399: RV_4,017.03a bhinad giriṃ śavasā vajram iṣṇann āviṣkṛṇvānaḥ sahasāna ojaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:400: RV_4,017.03c vadhīd vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ sarann āpo javasā hatavṛṣṇīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:401: RV_4,017.04a suvīras te janitā manyata dyaur indrasya kartā svapastamo bhūt |
GV01rv_hn04u:402: RV_4,017.04c ya īṃ jajāna svaryaṃ suvajram anapacyutaṃ sadaso na bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:403: RV_4,017.05a ya eka ic cyāvayati pra bhūmā rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūta indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:404: RV_4,017.05c satyam enam anu viśve madanti rātiṃ devasya gṛṇato maghonaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:405: RV_4,017.06a satrā somā abhavann asya viśve satrā madāso bṛhato madiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:406: RV_4,017.06c satrābhavo vasupatir vasūnāṃ datre viśvā adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:407: RV_4,017.07a tvam adha prathamaṃ jāyamāno 'me viśvā adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:408: RV_4,017.07c tvam prati pravata āśayānam ahiṃ vajreṇa maghavan vi vṛścaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:409: RV_4,017.08a satrāhaṇaṃ dādhṛṣiṃ tumram indram mahām apāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suvajram |
GV01rv_hn04u:410: RV_4,017.08c hantā yo vṛtraṃ sanitota vājaṃ dātā maghāni maghavā surādhāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:411: RV_4,017.09a ayaṃ vṛtaś cātayate samīcīr ya ājiṣu maghavā śṛṇva ekaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:412: RV_4,017.09c ayaṃ vājam bharati yaṃ sanoty asya priyāsaḥ sakhye syāma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:413: RV_4,017.10a ayaṃ śṛṇve adha jayann uta ghnann ayam uta pra kṛṇute yudhā gāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:414: RV_4,017.10c yadā satyaṃ kṛṇute manyum indro viśvaṃ dṛḷham bhayata ejad
GV01rv_hn04u:416: RV_4,017.11a sam indro gā ajayat saṃ hiraṇyā sam aśviyā maghavā yo ha pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:417: RV_4,017.11c ebhir nṛbhir nṛtamo asya śākai rāyo vibhaktā sambharaś ca
GV01rv_hn04u:419: RV_4,017.12a kiyat svid indro adhy eti mātuḥ kiyat pitur janitur yo jajāna |
GV01rv_hn04u:420: RV_4,017.12c yo asya śuṣmam muhukair iyarti vāto na jūta stanayadbhir
GV01rv_hn04u:422: RV_4,017.13a kṣiyantaṃ tvam akṣiyantaṃ kṛṇotīyarti reṇum maghavā samoham |
GV01rv_hn04u:423: RV_4,017.13c vibhañjanur aśanimāṃ iva dyaur uta stotāram maghavā vasau dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn04u:424: RV_4,017.14a ayaṃ cakram iṣaṇat sūryasya ny etaśaṃ rīramat sasṛmāṇam |
GV01rv_hn04u:425: RV_4,017.14b ā kṛṣṇa īṃ juhurāṇo jigharti tvaco budhne rajaso asya yonau
GV01rv_hn04u:427: RV_4,017.16a gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:428: RV_4,017.16c janīyanto janidām akṣitotim ā cyāvayāmo 'vate na kośam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:429: RV_4,017.17a trātā no bodhi dadṛśāna āpir abhikhyātā marḍitā somyānām |
GV01rv_hn04u:430: RV_4,017.17c sakhā pitā pitṛtamaḥ pitṝṇāṃ kartem u lokam uśate vayodhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:431: RV_4,017.18a sakhīyatām avitā bodhi sakhā gṛṇāna indra stuvate vayo dhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:432: RV_4,017.18c vayaṃ hy ā te cakṛmā sabādha ābhiḥ śamībhir mahayanta indra
GV01rv_hn04u:433: RV_4,017.19a stuta indro maghavā yad dha vṛtrā bhūrīṇy eko apratīni hanti
GV01rv_hn04u:434: RV_4,017.19c asya priyo jaritā yasya śarman nakir devā vārayante na martāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:435: RV_4,017.20a evā na indro maghavā virapśī karat satyā carṣaṇīdhṛd anarvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:436: RV_4,017.20c tvaṃ rājā januṣāṃ dhehy asme adhi śravo māhinaṃ yaj jaritre
GV01rv_hn04u:437: RV_4,017.21a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:438: RV_4,017.21c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:439: RV_4,018.01a ayam panthā anuvittaḥ purāṇo yato devā udajāyanta viśve |
GV01rv_hn04u:440: RV_4,018.01c ataś cid ā janiṣīṣṭa pravṛddho mā mātaram amuyā pattave kaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:441: RV_4,018.02a nāham ato nir ayā durgahaitat tiraścatā pārśvān nir gamāṇi |
GV01rv_hn04u:442: RV_4,018.02c bahūni me akṛtā kartvāni yudhyai tvena saṃ tvena pṛcchai ||
GV01rv_hn04u:443: RV_4,018.03a parāyatīm mātaram anv acaṣṭa na nānu gāny anu nū gamāni |
GV01rv_hn04u:444: RV_4,018.03c tvaṣṭur gṛhe apibat somam indraḥ śatadhanyaṃ camvoḥ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:445: RV_4,018.04a kiṃ sa ṛdhak kṛṇavad yaṃ sahasram māso jabhāra śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:446: RV_4,018.04c nahī nv asya pratimānam asty antar jāteṣūta ye janitvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:447: RV_4,018.05a avadyam iva manyamānā guhākar indram mātā vīryeṇā nyṛṣṭam |
GV01rv_hn04u:448: RV_4,018.05c athod asthāt svayam atkaṃ vasāna ā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:449: RV_4,018.06a etā arṣanty alalābhavantīr ṛtāvarīr iva saṃkrośamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:450: RV_4,018.06c etā vi pṛccha kim idam bhananti kam āpo adrim paridhiṃ rujanti ||
GV01rv_hn04u:451: RV_4,018.07a kim u ṣvid asmai nivido bhanantendrasyāvadyaṃ didhiṣanta āpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:452: RV_4,018.07c mamaitān putro mahatā vadhena vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad vi sindhūn ||
GV01rv_hn04u:453: RV_4,018.08a mamac cana tvā yuvatiḥ parāsa mamac cana tvā kuṣavā jagāra |
GV01rv_hn04u:454: RV_4,018.08c mamac cid āpaḥ śiśave mamṛḍyur mamac cid indraḥ sahasod
GV01rv_hn04u:456: RV_4,018.09a mamac cana te maghavan vyaṃso nivividhvāṃ apa hanū jaghāna |
GV01rv_hn04u:457: RV_4,018.09c adhā nividdha uttaro babhūvāñ chiro dāsasya sam piṇag vadhena
GV01rv_hn04u:458: RV_4,018.10a gṛṣṭiḥ sasūva sthaviraṃ tavāgām anādhṛṣyaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tumram indram |
GV01rv_hn04u:459: RV_4,018.10c arīḷhaṃ vatsaṃ carathāya mātā svayaṃ gātuṃ tanva icchamānam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:460: RV_4,018.11a uta mātā mahiṣam anv avenad amī tvā jahati putra devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:461: RV_4,018.11c athābravīd vṛtram indro haniṣyan sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva ||
GV01rv_hn04u:462: RV_4,018.12a kas te mātaraṃ vidhavām acakrac chayuṃ kas tvām ajighāṃsac
GV01rv_hn04u:464: RV_4,018.12c kas te devo adhi mārḍīka āsīd yat prākṣiṇāḥ pitaram pādagṛhya
GV01rv_hn04u:465: RV_4,018.13a avartyā śuna āntrāṇi pece na deveṣu vivide marḍitāram |
GV01rv_hn04u:466: RV_4,018.13c apaśyaṃ jāyām amahīyamānām adhā me śyeno madhv ā jabhāra ||
GV01rv_hn04u:467: RV_4,019.01a evā tvām indra vajrinn atra viśve devāsaḥ suhavāsa ūmāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:468: RV_4,019.01c mahām ubhe rodasī vṛddham ṛṣvaṃ nir ekam id vṛṇate vṛtrahatye
GV01rv_hn04u:469: RV_4,019.02a avāsṛjanta jivrayo na devā bhuvaḥ samrāḷ indra satyayoniḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:470: RV_4,019.02c ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ pra vartanīr arado viśvadhenāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:471: RV_4,019.03a atṛpṇuvantaṃ viyatam abudhyam abudhyamānaṃ suṣupāṇam indra |
GV01rv_hn04u:472: RV_4,019.03c sapta prati pravata āśayānam ahiṃ vajreṇa vi riṇā aparvan ||
GV01rv_hn04u:473: RV_4,019.04a akṣodayac chavasā kṣāma budhnaṃ vār ṇa vātas taviṣībhir indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:474: RV_4,019.04c dṛḷhāny aubhnād uśamāna ojo 'vābhinat kakubhaḥ parvatānām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:475: RV_4,019.05a abhi pra dadrur janayo na garbhaṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sākam adrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:476: RV_4,019.05c atarpayo visṛta ubja ūrmīn tvaṃ vṛtāṃ ariṇā indra sindhūn ||
GV01rv_hn04u:477: RV_4,019.06a tvam mahīm avaniṃ viśvadhenāṃ turvītaye vayyāya kṣarantīm |
GV01rv_hn04u:478: RV_4,019.06c aramayo namasaijad arṇaḥ sutaraṇāṃ akṛṇor indra sindhūn ||
GV01rv_hn04u:479: RV_4,019.07a prāgruvo nabhanvo na vakvā dhvasrā apinvad yuvatīr ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:480: RV_4,019.07c dhanvāny ajrāṃ apṛṇak tṛṣāṇāṃ adhog indra staryo daṃsupatnīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:481: RV_4,019.08a pūrvīr uṣasaḥ śaradaś ca gūrtā vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad vi
GV01rv_hn04u:483: RV_4,019.08c pariṣṭhitā atṛṇad badbadhānāḥ sīrā indraḥ sravitave pṛthivyā
GV01rv_hn04u:484: RV_4,019.09a vamrībhiḥ putram agruvo adānaṃ niveśanād dhariva ā jabhartha |
GV01rv_hn04u:485: RV_4,019.09c vy andho akhyad ahim ādadāno nir bhūd ukhacchit sam aranta parva ||
GV01rv_hn04u:486: RV_4,019.10a pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni viprāvidvāṃ āha viduṣe karāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn04u:487: RV_4,019.10c yathā-yathā vṛṣṇyāni svagūrtāpāṃsi rājan naryāviveṣīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:488: RV_4,019.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:489: RV_4,019.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:490: RV_4,020.01a ā na indro dūrād ā na āsād abhiṣṭikṛd avase yāsad ugraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:491: RV_4,020.01c ojiṣṭhebhir nṛpatir vajrabāhuḥ saṃge samatsu turvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:493: RV_4,020.02a ā na indro haribhir yātv acchārvācīno 'vase rādhase ca |
GV01rv_hn04u:494: RV_4,020.02c tiṣṭhāti vajrī maghavā virapśīmaṃ yajñam anu no vājasātau ||
GV01rv_hn04u:495: RV_4,020.03a imaṃ yajñaṃ tvam asmākam indra puro dadhat saniṣyasi kratuṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:497: RV_4,020.03c śvaghnīva vajrin sanaye dhanānāṃ tvayā vayam arya ājiṃ jayema
GV01rv_hn04u:498: RV_4,020.04a uśann u ṣu ṇaḥ sumanā upāke somasya nu suṣutasya svadhāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:499: RV_4,020.04c pā indra pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ sam andhasā mamadaḥ pṛṣṭhyena ||
GV01rv_hn04u:500: RV_4,020.05a vi yo rarapśa ṛṣibhir navebhir vṛkṣo na pakvaḥ sṛṇyo na jetā |
GV01rv_hn04u:501: RV_4,020.05c maryo na yoṣām abhi manyamāno 'cchā vivakmi puruhūtam indram
GV01rv_hn04u:502: RV_4,020.06a girir na yaḥ svatavāṃ ṛṣva indraḥ sanād eva sahase jāta ugraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:503: RV_4,020.06c ādartā vajraṃ sthaviraṃ na bhīma udneva kośaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam
GV01rv_hn04u:504: RV_4,020.07a na yasya vartā januṣā nv asti na rādhasa āmarītā maghasya |
GV01rv_hn04u:505: RV_4,020.07c udvāvṛṣāṇas taviṣīva ugrāsmabhyaṃ daddhi puruhūta rāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:506: RV_4,020.08a īkṣe rāyaḥ kṣayasya carṣaṇīnām uta vrajam apavartāsi gonām |
GV01rv_hn04u:507: RV_4,020.08c śikṣānaraḥ samitheṣu prahāvān vasvo rāśim abhinetāsi bhūrim
GV01rv_hn04u:508: RV_4,020.09a kayā tac chṛṇve śacyā śaciṣṭho yayā kṛṇoti muhu kā cid ṛṣvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:509: RV_4,020.09c puru dāśuṣe vicayiṣṭho aṃho 'thā dadhāti draviṇaṃ jaritre ||
GV01rv_hn04u:510: RV_4,020.10a mā no mardhīr ā bharā daddhi tan naḥ pra dāśuṣe dātave bhūri
GV01rv_hn04u:512: RV_4,020.10c navye deṣṇe śaste asmin ta ukthe pra bravāma vayam indra stuvantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:513: RV_4,020.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:514: RV_4,020.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:515: RV_4,021.01a ā yātv indro 'vasa upa na iha stutaḥ sadhamād astu śūraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:516: RV_4,021.01c vāvṛdhānas taviṣīr yasya pūrvīr dyaur na kṣatram abhibhūti puṣyāt ||
GV01rv_hn04u:517: RV_4,021.02a tasyed iha stavatha vṛṣṇyāni tuvidyumnasya tuvirādhaso nṝn |
GV01rv_hn04u:518: RV_4,021.02c yasya kratur vidathyo na samrāṭ sāhvān tarutro abhy asti
GV01rv_hn04u:520: RV_4,021.03a ā yātv indro diva ā pṛthivyā makṣū samudrād uta vā purīṣāt |
GV01rv_hn04u:521: RV_4,021.03c svarṇarād avase no marutvān parāvato vā sadanād ṛtasya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:522: RV_4,021.04a sthūrasya rāyo bṛhato ya īśe tam u ṣṭavāma vidatheṣv indram |
GV01rv_hn04u:523: RV_4,021.04c yo vāyunā jayati gomatīṣu pra dhṛṣṇuyā nayati vasyo accha ||
GV01rv_hn04u:524: RV_4,021.05a upa yo namo namasi stabhāyann iyarti vācaṃ janayan yajadhyai
GV01rv_hn04u:525: RV_4,021.05c ṛñjasānaḥ puruvāra ukthair endraṃ kṛṇvīta sadaneṣu hotā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:526: RV_4,021.06a dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇyantaḥ saraṇyān sadanto adrim auśijasya gohe |
GV01rv_hn04u:527: RV_4,021.06c ā duroṣāḥ pāstyasya hotā yo no mahān saṃvaraṇeṣu vahniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:528: RV_4,021.07a satrā yad īm bhārvarasya vṛṣṇaḥ siṣakti śuṣma stuvate bharāya
GV01rv_hn04u:529: RV_4,021.07c guhā yad īm auśijasya gohe pra yad dhiye prāyase madāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:530: RV_4,021.08a vi yad varāṃsi parvatasya vṛṇve payobhir jinve apāṃ javāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn04u:531: RV_4,021.08c vidad gaurasya gavayasya gohe yadī vājāya sudhyo vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn04u:532: RV_4,021.09a bhadrā te hastā sukṛtota pāṇī prayantārā stuvate rādha indra
GV01rv_hn04u:533: RV_4,021.09c kā te niṣattiḥ kim u no mamatsi kiṃ nod-ud u harṣase dātavā u
GV01rv_hn04u:534: RV_4,021.10a evā vasva indraḥ satyaḥ samrāḍ ḍhantā vṛtraṃ varivaḥ pūrave
GV01rv_hn04u:536: RV_4,021.10c puruṣṭuta kratvā naḥ śagdhi rāyo bhakṣīya te 'vaso daivyasya
GV01rv_hn04u:537: RV_4,021.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:538: RV_4,021.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:539: RV_4,022.01a yan na indro jujuṣe yac ca vaṣṭi tan no mahān karati śuṣmy ā cit |
GV01rv_hn04u:540: RV_4,022.01c brahma stomam maghavā somam ukthā yo aśmānaṃ śavasā bibhrad
GV01rv_hn04u:542: RV_4,022.02a vṛṣā vṛṣandhiṃ caturaśrim asyann ugro bāhubhyāṃ nṛtamaḥ śacīvān |
GV01rv_hn04u:543: RV_4,022.02c śriye paruṣṇīm uṣamāṇa ūrṇāṃ yasyāḥ parvāṇi sakhyāya vivye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:544: RV_4,022.03a yo devo devatamo jāyamāno maho vājebhir mahadbhiś ca śuṣmaiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:545: RV_4,022.03c dadhāno vajram bāhvor uśantaṃ dyām amena rejayat pra bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:546: RV_4,022.04a viśvā rodhāṃsi pravataś ca pūrvīr dyaur ṛṣvāj janiman rejata
GV01rv_hn04u:548: RV_4,022.04c ā mātarā bharati śuṣmy ā gor nṛvat parijman nonuvanta vātāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:549: RV_4,022.05a tā tū ta indra mahato mahāni viśveṣv it savaneṣu pravācyā |
GV01rv_hn04u:550: RV_4,022.05c yac chūra dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā dadhṛṣvān ahiṃ vajreṇa śavasāviveṣīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:551: RV_4,022.06a tā tū te satyā tuvinṛmṇa viśvā pra dhenavaḥ sisrate vṛṣṇa ūdhnaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:552: RV_4,022.06c adhā ha tvad vṛṣamaṇo bhiyānāḥ pra sindhavo javasā cakramanta
GV01rv_hn04u:553: RV_4,022.07a atrāha te harivas tā u devīr avobhir indra stavanta svasāraḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:554: RV_4,022.07c yat sīm anu pra muco badbadhānā dīrghām anu prasitiṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:556: RV_4,022.08a pipīḷe aṃśur madyo na sindhur ā tvā śamī śaśamānasya śaktiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:557: RV_4,022.08c asmadryak chuśucānasya yamyā āśur na raśmiṃ tuvyojasaṃ goḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:558: RV_4,022.09a asme varṣiṣṭhā kṛṇuhi jyeṣṭhā nṛmṇāni satrā sahure sahāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn04u:559: RV_4,022.09c asmabhyaṃ vṛtrā suhanāni randhi jahi vadhar vanuṣo martyasya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:560: RV_4,022.10a asmākam it su śṛṇuhi tvam indrāsmabhyaṃ citrāṃ upa māhi vājān
GV01rv_hn04u:561: RV_4,022.10c asmabhyaṃ viśvā iṣaṇaḥ purandhīr asmākaṃ su maghavan bodhi godāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:562: RV_4,022.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:563: RV_4,022.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:564: RV_4,023.01a kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotur yajñaṃ juṣāṇo abhi somam
GV01rv_hn04u:566: RV_4,023.01c pibann uśāno juṣamāṇo andho vavakṣa ṛṣvaḥ śucate dhanāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:567: RV_4,023.02a ko asya vīraḥ sadhamādam āpa sam ānaṃśa sumatibhiḥ ko asya |
GV01rv_hn04u:568: RV_4,023.02c kad asya citraṃ cikite kad ūtī vṛdhe bhuvac chaśamānasya
GV01rv_hn04u:570: RV_4,023.03a kathā śṛṇoti hūyamānam indraḥ kathā śṛṇvann avasām asya veda
GV01rv_hn04u:571: RV_4,023.03c kā asya pūrvīr upamātayo ha kathainam āhuḥ papuriṃ jaritre ||
GV01rv_hn04u:572: RV_4,023.04a kathā sabādhaḥ śaśamāno asya naśad abhi draviṇaṃ dīdhyānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:573: RV_4,023.04c devo bhuvan navedā ma ṛtānāṃ namo jagṛbhvāṃ abhi yaj jujoṣat
GV01rv_hn04u:574: RV_4,023.05a kathā kad asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau devo martasya sakhyaṃ jujoṣa |
GV01rv_hn04u:575: RV_4,023.05c kathā kad asya sakhyaṃ sakhibhyo ye asmin kāmaṃ suyujaṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:577: RV_4,023.06a kim ād amatraṃ sakhyaṃ sakhibhyaḥ kadā nu te bhrātram pra bravāma |
GV01rv_hn04u:578: RV_4,023.06c śriye sudṛśo vapur asya sargāḥ svar ṇa citratamam iṣa ā goḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:579: RV_4,023.07a druhaṃ jighāṃsan dhvarasam anindrāṃ tetikte tigmā tujase anīkā |
GV01rv_hn04u:580: RV_4,023.07c ṛṇā cid yatra ṛṇayā na ugro dūre ajñātā uṣaso babādhe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:581: RV_4,023.08a ṛtasya hi śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīr ṛtasya dhītir vṛjināni hanti
GV01rv_hn04u:582: RV_4,023.08c ṛtasya śloko badhirā tatarda karṇā budhānaḥ śucamāna āyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:583: RV_4,023.09a ṛtasya dṛḷhā dharuṇāni santi purūṇi candrā vapuṣe vapūṃṣi |
GV01rv_hn04u:584: RV_4,023.09c ṛtena dīrgham iṣaṇanta pṛkṣa ṛtena gāva ṛtam ā viveśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:585: RV_4,023.10a ṛtaṃ yemāna ṛtam id vanoty ṛtasya śuṣmas turayā u gavyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:586: RV_4,023.10c ṛtāya pṛthvī bahule gabhīre ṛtāya dhenū parame duhāte ||
GV01rv_hn04u:587: RV_4,023.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:588: RV_4,023.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:589: RV_4,024.01a kā suṣṭutiḥ śavasaḥ sūnum indram arvācīnaṃ rādhasa ā vavartat
GV01rv_hn04u:590: RV_4,024.01c dadir hi vīro gṛṇate vasūni sa gopatir niṣṣidhāṃ no janāsaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:591: RV_4,024.02a sa vṛtrahatye havyaḥ sa īḍyaḥ sa suṣṭuta indraḥ satyarādhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:592: RV_4,024.02c sa yāmann ā maghavā martyāya brahmaṇyate suṣvaye varivo dhāt
GV01rv_hn04u:593: RV_4,024.03a tam in naro vi hvayante samīke ririkvāṃsas tanvaḥ kṛṇvata
GV01rv_hn04u:595: RV_4,024.03c mitho yat tyāgam ubhayāso agman naras tokasya tanayasya sātau
GV01rv_hn04u:596: RV_4,024.04a kratūyanti kṣitayo yoga ugrāśuṣāṇāso mitho arṇasātau |
GV01rv_hn04u:597: RV_4,024.04c saṃ yad viśo 'vavṛtranta yudhmā ād in nema indrayante abhīke
GV01rv_hn04u:598: RV_4,024.05a ād id dha nema indriyaṃ yajanta ād it paktiḥ puroḷāśaṃ riricyāt |
GV01rv_hn04u:599: RV_4,024.05c ād it somo vi papṛcyād asuṣvīn ād ij jujoṣa vṛṣabhaṃ yajadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn04u:600: RV_4,024.06a kṛṇoty asmai varivo ya itthendrāya somam uśate sunoti |
GV01rv_hn04u:601: RV_4,024.06c sadhrīcīnena manasāvivenan tam it sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute samatsu ||
GV01rv_hn04u:602: RV_4,024.07a ya indrāya sunavat somam adya pacāt paktīr uta bhṛjjāti
GV01rv_hn04u:604: RV_4,024.07c prati manāyor ucathāni haryan tasmin dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:605: RV_4,024.08a yadā samaryaṃ vy aced ṛghāvā dīrghaṃ yad ājim abhy akhyad aryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:606: RV_4,024.08c acikradad vṛṣaṇam patny acchā duroṇa ā niśitaṃ somasudbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:607: RV_4,024.09a bhūyasā vasnam acarat kanīyo 'vikrīto akāniṣam punar yan |
GV01rv_hn04u:608: RV_4,024.09c sa bhūyasā kanīyo nārirecīd dīnā dakṣā vi duhanti pra vāṇam
GV01rv_hn04u:609: RV_4,024.10a ka imaṃ daśabhir mamendraṃ krīṇāti dhenubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:610: RV_4,024.10c yadā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad athainam me punar dadat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:611: RV_4,024.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:612: RV_4,024.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:613: RV_4,025.01a ko adya naryo devakāma uśann indrasya sakhyaṃ jujoṣa |
GV01rv_hn04u:614: RV_4,025.01c ko vā mahe 'vase pāryāya samiddhe agnau sutasoma īṭṭe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:615: RV_4,025.02a ko nānāma vacasā somyāya manāyur vā bhavati vasta usrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:616: RV_4,025.02c ka indrasya yujyaṃ kaḥ sakhitvaṃ ko bhrātraṃ vaṣṭi kavaye ka ūtī ||
GV01rv_hn04u:617: RV_4,025.03a ko devānām avo adyā vṛṇīte ka ādityāṃ aditiṃ jyotir īṭṭe |
GV01rv_hn04u:618: RV_4,025.03c kasyāśvināv indro agniḥ sutasyāṃśoḥ pibanti manasāvivenam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:619: RV_4,025.04a tasmā agnir bhārataḥ śarma yaṃsaj jyok paśyāt sūryam uccarantam |
GV01rv_hn04u:620: RV_4,025.04c ya indrāya sunavāmety āha nare naryāya nṛtamāya nṛṇām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:621: RV_4,025.05a na taṃ jinanti bahavo na dabhrā urv asmā aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat |
GV01rv_hn04u:622: RV_4,025.05c priyaḥ sukṛt priya indre manāyuḥ priyaḥ suprāvīḥ priyo asya
GV01rv_hn04u:624: RV_4,025.06a suprāvyaḥ prāśuṣāḷ eṣa vīraḥ suṣveḥ paktiṃ kṛṇute kevalendraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:625: RV_4,025.06c nāsuṣver āpir na sakhā na jāmir duṣprāvyo 'vahanted avācaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:626: RV_4,025.07a na revatā paṇinā sakhyam indro 'sunvatā sutapāḥ saṃ gṛṇīte |
GV01rv_hn04u:627: RV_4,025.07c āsya vedaḥ khidati hanti nagnaṃ vi suṣvaye paktaye kevalo
GV01rv_hn04u:629: RV_4,025.08a indram pare 'vare madhyamāsa indraṃ yānto 'vasitāsa indram |
GV01rv_hn04u:630: RV_4,025.08c indraṃ kṣiyanta uta yudhyamānā indraṃ naro vājayanto havante ||
GV01rv_hn04u:631: RV_4,026.01a aham manur abhavaṃ sūryaś cāhaṃ kakṣīvāṃ ṛṣir asmi vipraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:632: RV_4,026.01c ahaṃ kutsam ārjuneyaṃ ny ṛñje 'haṃ kavir uśanā paśyatā mā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:633: RV_4,026.02a aham bhūmim adadām āryāyāhaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ dāśuṣe martyāya |
GV01rv_hn04u:634: RV_4,026.02c aham apo anayaṃ vāvaśānā mama devāso anu ketam āyan ||
GV01rv_hn04u:635: RV_4,026.03a aham puro mandasāno vy airaṃ nava sākaṃ navatīḥ śambarasya |
GV01rv_hn04u:636: RV_4,026.03c śatatamaṃ veśyaṃ sarvatātā divodāsam atithigvaṃ yad āvam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:637: RV_4,026.04a pra su ṣa vibhyo maruto vir astu pra śyenaḥ śyenebhya āśupatvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:638: RV_4,026.04c acakrayā yat svadhayā suparṇo havyam bharan manave devajuṣṭam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:639: RV_4,026.05a bharad yadi vir ato vevijānaḥ pathoruṇā manojavā asarji |
GV01rv_hn04u:640: RV_4,026.05c tūyaṃ yayau madhunā somyenota śravo vivide śyeno atra ||
GV01rv_hn04u:641: RV_4,026.06a ṛjīpī śyeno dadamāno aṃśum parāvataḥ śakuno mandram madam |
GV01rv_hn04u:642: RV_4,026.06c somam bharad dādṛhāṇo devāvān divo amuṣmād uttarād ādāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:643: RV_4,026.07a ādāya śyeno abharat somaṃ sahasraṃ savāṃ ayutaṃ ca sākam |
GV01rv_hn04u:644: RV_4,026.07c atrā purandhir ajahād arātīr made somasya mūrā amūraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:645: RV_4,027.01a garbhe nu sann anv eṣām avedam ahaṃ devānāṃ janimāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:646: RV_4,027.01c śatam mā pura āyasīr arakṣann adha śyeno javasā nir adīyam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:647: RV_4,027.02a na ghā sa mām apa joṣaṃ jabhārābhīm āsa tvakṣasā vīryeṇa |
GV01rv_hn04u:648: RV_4,027.02c īrmā purandhir ajahād arātīr uta vātāṃ atarac chūśuvānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:649: RV_4,027.03a ava yac chyeno asvanīd adha dyor vi yad yadi vāta ūhuḥ purandhim |
GV01rv_hn04u:650: RV_4,027.03c sṛjad yad asmā ava ha kṣipaj jyāṃ kṛśānur astā manasā bhuraṇyan ||
GV01rv_hn04u:651: RV_4,027.04a ṛjipya īm indrāvato na bhujyuṃ śyeno jabhāra bṛhato adhi ṣṇoḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:652: RV_4,027.04c antaḥ patat patatry asya parṇam adha yāmani prasitasya tad
GV01rv_hn04u:654: RV_4,027.05a adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktam āpipyānam maghavā śukram andhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:655: RV_4,027.05c adhvaryubhiḥ prayatam madhvo agram indro madāya prati dhat pibadhyai śūro madāya prati dhat pibadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn04u:656: RV_4,028.01a tvā yujā tava tat soma sakhya indro apo manave sasrutas kaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:657: RV_4,028.01c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn apāvṛṇod apihiteva khāni ||
GV01rv_hn04u:658: RV_4,028.02a tvā yujā ni khidat sūryasyendraś cakraṃ sahasā sadya indo |
GV01rv_hn04u:659: RV_4,028.02c adhi ṣṇunā bṛhatā vartamānam maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:660: RV_4,028.03a ahann indro adahad agnir indo purā dasyūn madhyandinād abhīke
GV01rv_hn04u:661: RV_4,028.03c durge duroṇe kratvā na yātām purū sahasrā śarvā ni barhīt ||
GV01rv_hn04u:662: RV_4,028.04a viśvasmāt sīm adhamāṃ indra dasyūn viśo dāsīr akṛṇor apraśastāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:663: RV_4,028.04c abādhethām amṛṇataṃ ni śatrūn avindethām apacitiṃ vadhatraiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:664: RV_4,028.05a evā satyam maghavānā yuvaṃ tad indraś ca somorvam aśvyaṃ goḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:665: RV_4,028.05c ādardṛtam apihitāny aśnā riricathuḥ kṣāś cit tatṛdānā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:666: RV_4,029.01a ā na stuta upa vājebhir ūtī indra yāhi haribhir mandasānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:667: RV_4,029.01c tiraś cid aryaḥ savanā purūṇy āṅgūṣebhir gṛṇānaḥ satyarādhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:668: RV_4,029.02a ā hi ṣmā yāti naryaś cikitvān hūyamānaḥ sotṛbhir upa yajñam |
GV01rv_hn04u:669: RV_4,029.02c svaśvo yo abhīrur manyamānaḥ suṣvāṇebhir madati saṃ ha vīraiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:670: RV_4,029.03a śrāvayed asya karṇā vājayadhyai juṣṭām anu pra diśam mandayadhyai |
GV01rv_hn04u:671: RV_4,029.03c udvāvṛṣāṇo rādhase tuviṣmān karan na indraḥ sutīrthābhayaṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn04u:672: RV_4,029.04a acchā yo gantā nādhamānam ūtī itthā vipraṃ havamānaṃ gṛṇantam
GV01rv_hn04u:673: RV_4,029.04c upa tmani dadhāno dhury āśūn sahasrāṇi śatāni vajrabāhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:674: RV_4,029.05a tvotāso maghavann indra viprā vayaṃ te syāma sūrayo gṛṇantaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:675: RV_4,029.05c bhejānāso bṛhaddivasya rāya ākāyyasya dāvane purukṣoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:676: RV_4,030.01a nakir indra tvad uttaro na jyāyāṃ asti vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn04u:678: RV_4,030.02a satrā te anu kṛṣṭayo viśvā cakreva vāvṛtuḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:680: RV_4,030.03a viśve caned anā tvā devāsa indra yuyudhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:682: RV_4,030.04a yatrota bādhitebhyaś cakraṃ kutsāya yudhyate |
GV01rv_hn04u:684: RV_4,030.05a yatra devāṃ ṛghāyato viśvāṃ ayudhya eka it |
GV01rv_hn04u:686: RV_4,030.06a yatrota martyāya kam ariṇā indra sūryam |
GV01rv_hn04u:688: RV_4,030.07a kim ād utāsi vṛtrahan maghavan manyumattamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:690: RV_4,030.08a etad ghed uta vīryam indra cakartha pauṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:691: RV_4,030.08c striyaṃ yad durhaṇāyuvaṃ vadhīr duhitaraṃ divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:692: RV_4,030.09a divaś cid ghā duhitaram mahān mahīyamānām |
GV01rv_hn04u:694: RV_4,030.10a apoṣā anasaḥ sarat sampiṣṭād aha bibhyuṣī |
GV01rv_hn04u:695: RV_4,030.10c ni yat sīṃ śiśnathad vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:696: RV_4,030.11a etad asyā anaḥ śaye susampiṣṭaṃ vipāśy ā |
GV01rv_hn04u:698: RV_4,030.12a uta sindhuṃ vibālyaṃ vitasthānām adhi kṣami |
GV01rv_hn04u:700: RV_4,030.13a uta śuṣṇasya dhṛṣṇuyā pra mṛkṣo abhi vedanam |
GV01rv_hn04u:702: RV_4,030.14a uta dāsaṃ kaulitaram bṛhataḥ parvatād adhi |
GV01rv_hn04u:704: RV_4,030.15a uta dāsasya varcinaḥ sahasrāṇi śatāvadhīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:706: RV_4,030.16a uta tyam putram agruvaḥ parāvṛktaṃ śatakratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:708: RV_4,030.17a uta tyā turvaśāyadū asnātārā śacīpatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:710: RV_4,030.18a uta tyā sadya āryā sarayor indra pārataḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:712: RV_4,030.19a anu dvā jahitā nayo 'ndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn04u:713: RV_4,030.19c na tat te sumnam aṣṭave ||
GV01rv_hn04u:714: RV_4,030.20a śatam aśmanmayīnām purām indro vy āsyat |
GV01rv_hn04u:716: RV_4,030.21a asvāpayad dabhītaye sahasrā triṃśataṃ hathaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:718: RV_4,030.22a sa ghed utāsi vṛtrahan samāna indra gopatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:720: RV_4,030.23a uta nūnaṃ yad indriyaṃ kariṣyā indra pauṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:721: RV_4,030.23c adyā nakiṣ ṭad ā minat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:722: RV_4,030.24a vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ ta ādure devo dadātv aryamā |
GV01rv_hn04u:723: RV_4,030.24c vāmam pūṣā vāmam bhago vāmaṃ devaḥ karūḷatī ||
GV01rv_hn04u:724: RV_4,031.01a kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn04u:726: RV_4,031.02a kas tvā satyo madānām maṃhiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:728: RV_4,031.03a abhī ṣu ṇaḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām |
GV01rv_hn04u:730: RV_4,031.04a abhī na ā vavṛtsva cakraṃ na vṛttam arvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:732: RV_4,031.05a pravatā hi kratūnām ā hā padeva gacchasi |
GV01rv_hn04u:734: RV_4,031.06a saṃ yat ta indra manyavaḥ saṃ cakrāṇi dadhanvire |
GV01rv_hn04u:736: RV_4,031.07a uta smā hi tvām āhur in maghavānaṃ śacīpate |
GV01rv_hn04u:738: RV_4,031.08a uta smā sadya it pari śaśamānāya sunvate |
GV01rv_hn04u:740: RV_4,031.09a nahi ṣmā te śataṃ cana rādho varanta āmuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:742: RV_4,031.10a asmāṃ avantu te śatam asmān sahasram ūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:744: RV_4,031.11a asmāṃ ihā vṛṇīṣva sakhyāya svastaye |
GV01rv_hn04u:746: RV_4,031.12a asmāṃ aviḍḍhi viśvahendra rāyā parīṇasā |
GV01rv_hn04u:748: RV_4,031.13a asmabhyaṃ tāṃ apā vṛdhi vrajāṃ asteva gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:750: RV_4,031.14a asmākaṃ dhṛṣṇuyā ratho dyumāṃ indrānapacyutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:752: RV_4,031.15a asmākam uttamaṃ kṛdhi śravo deveṣu sūrya |
GV01rv_hn04u:754: RV_4,032.01a ā tū na indra vṛtrahann asmākam ardham ā gahi |
GV01rv_hn04u:756: RV_4,032.02a bhṛmiś cid ghāsi tūtujir ā citra citriṇīṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn04u:758: RV_4,032.03a dabhrebhiś cic chaśīyāṃsaṃ haṃsi vrādhantam ojasā |
GV01rv_hn04u:760: RV_4,032.04a vayam indra tve sacā vayaṃ tvābhi nonumaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:762: RV_4,032.05a sa naś citrābhir adrivo 'navadyābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:764: RV_4,032.06a bhūyāmo ṣu tvāvataḥ sakhāya indra gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:766: RV_4,032.07a tvaṃ hy eka īśiṣa indra vājasya gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:767: RV_4,032.07c sa no yandhi mahīm iṣam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:768: RV_4,032.08a na tvā varante anyathā yad ditsasi stuto magham |
GV01rv_hn04u:770: RV_4,032.09a abhi tvā gotamā girānūṣata pra dāvane |
GV01rv_hn04u:772: RV_4,032.10a pra te vocāma vīryā yā mandasāna ārujaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:774: RV_4,032.11a tā te gṛṇanti vedhaso yāni cakartha pauṃsyā |
GV01rv_hn04u:776: RV_4,032.12a avīvṛdhanta gotamā indra tve stomavāhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:778: RV_4,032.13a yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam |
GV01rv_hn04u:780: RV_4,032.14a arvācīno vaso bhavāsme su matsvāndhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:782: RV_4,032.15a asmākaṃ tvā matīnām ā stoma indra yacchatu |
GV01rv_hn04u:784: RV_4,032.16a puroḷāśaṃ ca no ghaso joṣayāse giraś ca naḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:786: RV_4,032.17a sahasraṃ vyatīnāṃ yuktānām indram īmahe |
GV01rv_hn04u:788: RV_4,032.18a sahasrā te śatā vayaṃ gavām ā cyāvayāmasi |
GV01rv_hn04u:790: RV_4,032.19a daśa te kalaśānāṃ hiraṇyānām adhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn04u:792: RV_4,032.20a bhūridā bhūri dehi no mā dabhram bhūry ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn04u:794: RV_4,032.21a bhūridā hy asi śrutaḥ purutrā śūra vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn04u:796: RV_4,032.22a pra te babhrū vicakṣaṇa śaṃsāmi goṣaṇo napāt |
GV01rv_hn04u:798: RV_4,032.23a kanīnakeva vidradhe nave drupade arbhake |
GV01rv_hn04u:802: RV_4,033.01a pra ṛbhubhyo dūtam iva vācam iṣya upastire śvaitarīṃ dhenum
GV01rv_hn04u:804: RV_4,033.01c ye vātajūtās taraṇibhir evaiḥ pari dyāṃ sadyo apaso babhūvuḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:805: RV_4,033.02a yadāram akrann ṛbhavaḥ pitṛbhyām pariviṣṭī veṣaṇā daṃsanābhiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:806: RV_4,033.02c ād id devānām upa sakhyam āyan dhīrāsaḥ puṣṭim avahan manāyai
GV01rv_hn04u:807: RV_4,033.03a punar ye cakruḥ pitarā yuvānā sanā yūpeva jaraṇā śayānā |
GV01rv_hn04u:808: RV_4,033.03c te vājo vibhvāṃ ṛbhur indravanto madhupsaraso no 'vantu
GV01rv_hn04u:810: RV_4,033.04a yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavo gām arakṣan yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavo mā
GV01rv_hn04u:812: RV_4,033.04c yat saṃvatsam abharan bhāso asyās tābhiḥ śamībhir amṛtatvam āśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:813: RV_4,033.05a jyeṣṭha āha camasā dvā kareti kanīyān trīn kṛṇavāmety āha |
GV01rv_hn04u:814: RV_4,033.05c kaniṣṭha āha caturas kareti tvaṣṭa ṛbhavas tat panayad vaco
GV01rv_hn04u:816: RV_4,033.06a satyam ūcur nara evā hi cakrur anu svadhām ṛbhavo jagmur etām |
GV01rv_hn04u:817: RV_4,033.06c vibhrājamānāṃś camasāṃ ahevāvenat tvaṣṭā caturo dadṛśvān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:818: RV_4,033.07a dvādaśa dyūn yad agohyasyātithye raṇann ṛbhavaḥ sasantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:819: RV_4,033.07c sukṣetrākṛṇvann anayanta sindhūn dhanvātiṣṭhann oṣadhīr nimnam āpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:820: RV_4,033.08a rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ nareṣṭhāṃ ye dhenuṃ viśvajuvaṃ viśvarūpām |
GV01rv_hn04u:821: RV_4,033.08c ta ā takṣantv ṛbhavo rayiṃ naḥ svavasaḥ svapasaḥ suhastāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:822: RV_4,033.09a apo hy eṣām ajuṣanta devā abhi kratvā manasā dīdhyānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:823: RV_4,033.09c vājo devānām abhavat sukarmendrasya ṛbhukṣā varuṇasya vibhvā
GV01rv_hn04u:824: RV_4,033.10a ye harī medhayokthā madanta indrāya cakruḥ suyujā ye aśvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:825: RV_4,033.10c te rāyas poṣaṃ draviṇāny asme dhatta ṛbhavaḥ kṣemayanto na
GV01rv_hn04u:827: RV_4,033.11a idāhnaḥ pītim uta vo madaṃ dhur na ṛte śrāntasya sakhyāya devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:828: RV_4,033.11c te nūnam asme ṛbhavo vasūni tṛtīye asmin savane dadhāta ||
GV01rv_hn04u:829: RV_4,034.01a ṛbhur vibhvā vāja indro no acchemaṃ yajñaṃ ratnadheyopa yāta
GV01rv_hn04u:830: RV_4,034.01c idā hi vo dhiṣaṇā devy ahnām adhāt pītiṃ sam madā agmatā vaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:831: RV_4,034.02a vidānāso janmano vājaratnā uta ṛtubhir ṛbhavo mādayadhvam |
GV01rv_hn04u:832: RV_4,034.02c saṃ vo madā agmata sam purandhiḥ suvīrām asme rayim
GV01rv_hn04u:834: RV_4,034.03a ayaṃ vo yajña ṛbhavo 'kāri yam ā manuṣvat pradivo dadhidhve |
GV01rv_hn04u:835: RV_4,034.03c pra vo 'cchā jujuṣāṇāso asthur abhūta viśve agriyota vājāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:836: RV_4,034.04a abhūd u vo vidhate ratnadheyam idā naro dāśuṣe martyāya |
GV01rv_hn04u:837: RV_4,034.04c pibata vājā ṛbhavo dade vo mahi tṛtīyaṃ savanam madāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:838: RV_4,034.05a ā vājā yātopa na ṛbhukṣā maho naro draviṇaso gṛṇānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:839: RV_4,034.05c ā vaḥ pītayo 'bhipitve ahnām imā astaṃ navasva iva gman ||
GV01rv_hn04u:840: RV_4,034.06a ā napātaḥ śavaso yātanopemaṃ yajñaṃ namasā hūyamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:841: RV_4,034.06c sajoṣasaḥ sūrayo yasya ca stha madhvaḥ pāta ratnadhā indravantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:842: RV_4,034.07a sajoṣā indra varuṇena somaṃ sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:843: RV_4,034.07c agrepābhir ṛtupābhiḥ sajoṣā gnāspatnībhī ratnadhābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:844: RV_4,034.08a sajoṣasa ādityair mādayadhvaṃ sajoṣasa ṛbhavaḥ parvatebhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:845: RV_4,034.08c sajoṣaso daivyenā savitrā sajoṣasaḥ sindhubhī ratnadhebhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:846: RV_4,034.09a ye aśvinā ye pitarā ya ūtī dhenuṃ tatakṣur ṛbhavo ye aśvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:847: RV_4,034.09c ye aṃsatrā ya ṛdhag rodasī ye vibhvo naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:848: RV_4,034.10a ye gomantaṃ vājavantaṃ suvīraṃ rayiṃ dhattha vasumantam purukṣum |
GV01rv_hn04u:849: RV_4,034.10c te agrepā ṛbhavo mandasānā asme dhatta ye ca rātiṃ gṛṇanti ||
GV01rv_hn04u:850: RV_4,034.11a nāpābhūta na vo 'tītṛṣāmāniḥśastā ṛbhavo yajñe asmin |
GV01rv_hn04u:851: RV_4,034.11c sam indreṇa madatha sam marudbhiḥ saṃ rājabhī ratnadheyāya devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:852: RV_4,035.01a ihopa yāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo māpa bhūta |
GV01rv_hn04u:853: RV_4,035.01c asmin hi vaḥ savane ratnadheyaṃ gamantv indram anu vo madāsaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:854: RV_4,035.02a āgann ṛbhūṇām iha ratnadheyam abhūt somasya suṣutasya pītiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:855: RV_4,035.02c sukṛtyayā yat svapasyayā caṃ ekaṃ vicakra camasaṃ caturdhā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:856: RV_4,035.03a vy akṛṇota camasaṃ caturdhā sakhe vi śikṣety abravīta |
GV01rv_hn04u:857: RV_4,035.03c athaita vājā amṛtasya panthāṃ gaṇaṃ devānām ṛbhavaḥ suhastāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:858: RV_4,035.04a kimmayaḥ svic camasa eṣa āsa yaṃ kāvyena caturo vicakra |
GV01rv_hn04u:859: RV_4,035.04c athā sunudhvaṃ savanam madāya pāta ṛbhavo madhunaḥ somyasya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:860: RV_4,035.05a śacyākarta pitarā yuvānā śacyākarta camasaṃ devapānam |
GV01rv_hn04u:861: RV_4,035.05c śacyā harī dhanutarāv ataṣṭendravāhāv ṛbhavo vājaratnāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:862: RV_4,035.06a yo vaḥ sunoty abhipitve ahnāṃ tīvraṃ vājāsaḥ savanam madāya |
GV01rv_hn04u:863: RV_4,035.06c tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarvavīram ā takṣata vṛṣaṇo mandasānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:864: RV_4,035.07a prātaḥ sutam apibo haryaśva mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te |
GV01rv_hn04u:865: RV_4,035.07c sam ṛbhubhiḥ pibasva ratnadhebhiḥ sakhīṃr yāṃ indra cakṛṣe sukṛtyā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:866: RV_4,035.08a ye devāso abhavatā sukṛtyā śyenā ived adhi divi niṣeda |
GV01rv_hn04u:867: RV_4,035.08c te ratnaṃ dhāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā abhavatāmṛtāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:868: RV_4,035.09a yat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ ratnadheyam akṛṇudhvaṃ svapasyā suhastāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:869: RV_4,035.09c tad ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktaṃ va etat sam madebhir indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:870: RV_4,036.01a anaśvo jāto anabhīśur ukthyo rathas tricakraḥ pari vartate rajaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:871: RV_4,036.01c mahat tad vo devyasya pravācanaṃ dyām ṛbhavaḥ pṛthivīṃ yac ca puṣyatha ||
GV01rv_hn04u:872: RV_4,036.02a rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ sucetaso 'vihvarantam manasas pari dhyayā |
GV01rv_hn04u:873: RV_4,036.02c tāṃ ū nv asya savanasya pītaya ā vo vājā ṛbhavo vedayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:874: RV_4,036.03a tad vo vājā ṛbhavaḥ supravācanaṃ deveṣu vibhvo abhavan mahitvanam |
GV01rv_hn04u:875: RV_4,036.03c jivrī yat santā pitarā sanājurā punar yuvānā carathāya takṣatha ||
GV01rv_hn04u:876: RV_4,036.04a ekaṃ vi cakra camasaṃ caturvayaṃ niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta
GV01rv_hn04u:878: RV_4,036.04c athā deveṣv amṛtatvam ānaśa śruṣṭī vājā ṛbhavas tad va
GV01rv_hn04u:880: RV_4,036.05a ṛbhuto rayiḥ prathamaśravastamo vājaśrutāso yam ajījanan
GV01rv_hn04u:882: RV_4,036.05c vibhvataṣṭo vidatheṣu pravācyo yaṃ devāso 'vathā sa vicarṣaṇiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:883: RV_4,036.06a sa vājy arvā sa ṛṣir vacasyayā sa śūro astā pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:884: RV_4,036.06c sa rāyas poṣaṃ sa suvīryaṃ dadhe yaṃ vājo vibhvāṃ ṛbhavo yam āviṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:885: RV_4,036.07a śreṣṭhaṃ vaḥ peśo adhi dhāyi darśataṃ stomo vājā ṛbhavas taṃ jujuṣṭana |
GV01rv_hn04u:886: RV_4,036.07c dhīrāso hi ṣṭhā kavayo vipaścitas tān va enā brahmaṇā
GV01rv_hn04u:888: RV_4,036.08a yūyam asmabhyaṃ dhiṣaṇābhyas pari vidvāṃso viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā |
GV01rv_hn04u:889: RV_4,036.08c dyumantaṃ vājaṃ vṛṣaśuṣmam uttamam ā no rayim ṛbhavas takṣatā
GV01rv_hn04u:891: RV_4,036.09a iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇā iha śravo vīravat takṣatā naḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:892: RV_4,036.09c yena vayaṃ citayemāty anyān taṃ vājaṃ citram ṛbhavo dadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:893: RV_4,037.01a upa no vājā adhvaram ṛbhukṣā devā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:894: RV_4,037.01c yathā yajñam manuṣo vikṣv āsu dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣv ahnām
GV01rv_hn04u:895: RV_4,037.02a te vo hṛde manase santu yajñā juṣṭāso adya ghṛtanirṇijo guḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:896: RV_4,037.02c pra vaḥ sutāso harayanta pūrṇāḥ kratve dakṣāya harṣayanta pītāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:897: RV_4,037.03a tryudāyaṃ devahitaṃ yathā va stomo vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo dade vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:898: RV_4,037.03c juhve manuṣvad uparāsu vikṣu yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:899: RV_4,037.04a pīvoaśvāḥ śucadrathā hi bhūtāyaḥśiprā vājinaḥ suniṣkāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:900: RV_4,037.04c indrasya sūno śavaso napāto 'nu vaś cety agriyam madāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:901: RV_4,037.05a ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇo rayiṃ vāje vājintamaṃ yujam |
GV01rv_hn04u:903: RV_4,037.06a sed ṛbhavo yam avatha yūyam indraś ca martyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:904: RV_4,037.06c sa dhībhir astu sanitā medhasātā so arvatā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:905: RV_4,037.07a vi no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pathaś citana yaṣṭave |
GV01rv_hn04u:906: RV_4,037.07c asmabhyaṃ sūraya stutā viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:907: RV_4,037.08a taṃ no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇa indra nāsatyā rayim |
GV01rv_hn04u:908: RV_4,037.08c sam aśvaṃ carṣaṇibhya ā puru śasta maghattaye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:909: RV_4,038.01a uto hi vāṃ dātrā santi pūrvā yā pūrubhyas trasadasyur nitośe
GV01rv_hn04u:910: RV_4,038.01c kṣetrāsāṃ dadathur urvarāsāṃ ghanaṃ dasyubhyo abhibhūtim
GV01rv_hn04u:912: RV_4,038.02a uta vājinam puruniṣṣidhvānaṃ dadhikrām u dadathur viśvakṛṣṭim
GV01rv_hn04u:913: RV_4,038.02c ṛjipyaṃ śyenam pruṣitapsum āśuṃ carkṛtyam aryo nṛpatiṃ na śūram ||
GV01rv_hn04u:914: RV_4,038.03a yaṃ sīm anu pravateva dravantaṃ viśvaḥ pūrur madati harṣamāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:915: RV_4,038.03c paḍbhir gṛdhyantam medhayuṃ na śūraṃ rathaturaṃ vātam iva dhrajantam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:916: RV_4,038.04a yaḥ smārundhāno gadhyā samatsu sanutaraś carati goṣu gacchan |
GV01rv_hn04u:917: RV_4,038.04c āvirṛjīko vidathā nicikyat tiro aratim pary āpa āyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:918: RV_4,038.05a uta smainaṃ vastramathiṃ na tāyum anu krośanti kṣitayo bhareṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:919: RV_4,038.05c nīcāyamānaṃ jasuriṃ na śyenaṃ śravaś cācchā paśumac ca yūtham
GV01rv_hn04u:920: RV_4,038.06a uta smāsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan ni veveti śreṇibhī rathānām |
GV01rv_hn04u:921: RV_4,038.06c srajaṃ kṛṇvāno janyo na śubhvā reṇuṃ rerihat kiraṇaṃ dadaśvān
GV01rv_hn04u:922: RV_4,038.07a uta sya vājī sahurir ṛtāvā śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye |
GV01rv_hn04u:923: RV_4,038.07c turaṃ yatīṣu turayann ṛjipyo 'dhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan
GV01rv_hn04u:924: RV_4,038.08a uta smāsya tanyator iva dyor ṛghāyato abhiyujo bhayante |
GV01rv_hn04u:925: RV_4,038.08c yadā sahasram abhi ṣīm ayodhīd durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīma
GV01rv_hn04u:927: RV_4,038.09a uta smāsya panayanti janā jūtiṃ kṛṣṭipro abhibhūtim āśoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:928: RV_4,038.09c utainam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ parā dadhikrā asarat sahasraiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:929: RV_4,038.10a ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna |
GV01rv_hn04u:930: RV_4,038.10c sahasrasāḥ śatasā vājy arvā pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:931: RV_4,039.01a āśuṃ dadhikrāṃ tam u nu ṣṭavāma divas pṛthivyā uta carkirāma
GV01rv_hn04u:932: RV_4,039.01c ucchantīr mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantv ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan ||
GV01rv_hn04u:933: RV_4,039.02a mahaś carkarmy arvataḥ kratuprā dadhikrāvṇaḥ puruvārasya
GV01rv_hn04u:935: RV_4,039.02c yam pūrubhyo dīdivāṃsaṃ nāgniṃ dadathur mitrāvaruṇā taturim
GV01rv_hn04u:936: RV_4,039.03a yo aśvasya dadhikrāvṇo akārīt samiddhe agnā uṣaso vyuṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn04u:937: RV_4,039.03c anāgasaṃ tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu sa mitreṇa varuṇenā sajoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:938: RV_4,039.04a dadhikrāvṇa iṣa ūrjo maho yad amanmahi marutāṃ nāma bhadram |
GV01rv_hn04u:939: RV_4,039.04c svastaye varuṇam mitram agniṃ havāmaha indraṃ vajrabāhum ||
GV01rv_hn04u:940: RV_4,039.05a indram ived ubhaye vi hvayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:941: RV_4,039.05c dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya dadathur mitrāvaruṇā no aśvam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:942: RV_4,039.06a dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣaṃ jiṣṇor aśvasya vājinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:943: RV_4,039.06c surabhi no mukhā karat pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:944: RV_4,040.01a dadhikrāvṇa id u nu carkirāma viśvā in mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu |
GV01rv_hn04u:945: RV_4,040.01c apām agner uṣasaḥ sūryasya bṛhaspater āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:946: RV_4,040.02a satvā bhariṣo gaviṣo duvanyasac chravasyād iṣa uṣasas turaṇyasat |
GV01rv_hn04u:947: RV_4,040.02c satyo dravo dravaraḥ pataṅgaro dadhikrāveṣam ūrjaṃ svar janat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:948: RV_4,040.03a uta smāsya dravatas turaṇyataḥ parṇaṃ na ver anu vāti
GV01rv_hn04u:950: RV_4,040.03c śyenasyeva dhrajato aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ sahorjā
GV01rv_hn04u:952: RV_4,040.04a uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyām baddho apikakṣa āsani |
GV01rv_hn04u:953: RV_4,040.04c kratuṃ dadhikrā anu saṃtavītvat pathām aṅkāṃsy anv āpanīphaṇat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:954: RV_4,040.05a haṃsaḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir duroṇasat |
GV01rv_hn04u:955: RV_4,040.05c nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:956: RV_4,041.01a indrā ko vāṃ varuṇā sumnam āpa stomo haviṣmāṃ amṛto na hotā |
GV01rv_hn04u:957: RV_4,041.01c yo vāṃ hṛdi kratumāṃ asmad uktaḥ pasparśad indrāvaruṇā namasvān ||
GV01rv_hn04u:958: RV_4,041.02a indrā ha yo varuṇā cakra āpī devau martaḥ sakhyāya prayasvān
GV01rv_hn04u:959: RV_4,041.02c sa hanti vṛtrā samitheṣu śatrūn avobhir vā mahadbhiḥ sa pra śṛṇve ||
GV01rv_hn04u:960: RV_4,041.03a indrā ha ratnaṃ varuṇā dheṣṭhetthā nṛbhyaḥ śaśamānebhyas tā |
GV01rv_hn04u:961: RV_4,041.03c yadī sakhāyā sakhyāya somaiḥ sutebhiḥ suprayasā mādayaite ||
GV01rv_hn04u:962: RV_4,041.04a indrā yuvaṃ varuṇā didyum asminn ojiṣṭham ugrā ni vadhiṣṭaṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:964: RV_4,041.04c yo no durevo vṛkatir dabhītis tasmin mimāthām abhibhūty ojaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:965: RV_4,041.05a indrā yuvaṃ varuṇā bhūtam asyā dhiyaḥ pretārā vṛṣabheva dhenoḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:966: RV_4,041.05c sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:967: RV_4,041.06a toke hite tanaya urvarāsu sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaś ca pauṃsye |
GV01rv_hn04u:968: RV_4,041.06c indrā no atra varuṇā syātām avobhir dasmā paritakmyāyām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:969: RV_4,041.07a yuvām id dhy avase pūrvyāya pari prabhūtī gaviṣaḥ svāpī |
GV01rv_hn04u:970: RV_4,041.07c vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya priyāya śūrā maṃhiṣṭhā pitareva śambhū ||
GV01rv_hn04u:971: RV_4,041.08a tā vāṃ dhiyo 'vase vājayantīr ājiṃ na jagmur yuvayūḥ sudānū |
GV01rv_hn04u:972: RV_4,041.08c śriye na gāva upa somam asthur indraṃ giro varuṇam me manīṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:973: RV_4,041.09a imā indraṃ varuṇam me manīṣā agmann upa draviṇam icchamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:974: RV_4,041.09c upem asthur joṣṭāra iva vasvo raghvīr iva śravaso bhikṣamāṇāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:975: RV_4,041.10a aśvyasya tmanā rathyasya puṣṭer nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma |
GV01rv_hn04u:976: RV_4,041.10c tā cakrāṇā ūtibhir navyasībhir asmatrā rāyo niyutaḥ sacantām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:977: RV_4,041.11a ā no bṛhantā bṛhatībhir ūtī indra yātaṃ varuṇa vājasātau |
GV01rv_hn04u:978: RV_4,041.11c yad didyavaḥ pṛtanāsu prakrīḷān tasya vāṃ syāma sanitāra ājeḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:979: RV_4,042.01a mama dvitā rāṣṭraṃ kṣatriyasya viśvāyor viśve amṛtā yathā naḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:980: RV_4,042.01c kratuṃ sacante varuṇasya devā rājāmi kṛṣṭer upamasya vavreḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:981: RV_4,042.02a ahaṃ rājā varuṇo mahyaṃ tāny asuryāṇi prathamā dhārayanta |
GV01rv_hn04u:982: RV_4,042.02c kratuṃ sacante varuṇasya devā rājāmi kṛṣṭer upamasya vavreḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:983: RV_4,042.03a aham indro varuṇas te mahitvorvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke |
GV01rv_hn04u:984: RV_4,042.03c tvaṣṭeva viśvā bhuvanāni vidvān sam airayaṃ rodasī dhārayaṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn04u:985: RV_4,042.04a aham apo apinvam ukṣamāṇā dhārayaṃ divaṃ sadana ṛtasya |
GV01rv_hn04u:986: RV_4,042.04c ṛtena putro aditer ṛtāvota tridhātu prathayad vi bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:987: RV_4,042.05a māṃ naraḥ svaśvā vājayanto māṃ vṛtāḥ samaraṇe havante |
GV01rv_hn04u:988: RV_4,042.05c kṛṇomy ājim maghavāham indra iyarmi reṇum abhibhūtyojāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:989: RV_4,042.06a ahaṃ tā viśvā cakaraṃ nakir mā daivyaṃ saho varate apratītam
GV01rv_hn04u:990: RV_4,042.06c yan mā somāso mamadan yad ukthobhe bhayete rajasī apāre ||
GV01rv_hn04u:991: RV_4,042.07a viduṣ ṭe viśvā bhuvanāni tasya tā pra bravīṣi varuṇāya vedhaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:992: RV_4,042.07c tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi śṛṇviṣe jaghanvān tvaṃ vṛtāṃ ariṇā indra sindhūn
GV01rv_hn04u:993: RV_4,042.08a asmākam atra pitaras ta āsan sapta ṛṣayo daurgahe badhyamāne
GV01rv_hn04u:994: RV_4,042.08c ta āyajanta trasadasyum asyā indraṃ na vṛtraturam ardhadevam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:995: RV_4,042.09a purukutsānī hi vām adāśad dhavyebhir indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:996: RV_4,042.09c athā rājānaṃ trasadasyum asyā vṛtrahaṇaṃ dadathur ardhadevam
GV01rv_hn04u:997: RV_4,042.10a rāyā vayaṃ sasavāṃso madema havyena devā yavasena gāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:998: RV_4,042.10c tāṃ dhenum indrāvaruṇā yuvaṃ no viśvāhā dhattam anapasphurantīm ||
GV01rv_hn04u:999: RV_4,043.01a ka u śravat katamo yajñiyānāṃ vandāru devaḥ katamo juṣāte |
GV01rv_hn04u:1000: RV_4,043.01c kasyemāṃ devīm amṛteṣu preṣṭhāṃ hṛdi śreṣāma suṣṭutiṃ suhavyām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1001: RV_4,043.02a ko mṛḷāti katama āgamiṣṭho devānām u katamaḥ śambhaviṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1002: RV_4,043.02c rathaṃ kam āhur dravadaśvam āśuṃ yaṃ sūryasya duhitāvṛṇīta ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1003: RV_4,043.03a makṣū hi ṣmā gacchatha īvato dyūn indro na śaktim
GV01rv_hn04u:1005: RV_4,043.03c diva ājātā divyā suparṇā kayā śacīnām bhavathaḥ śaciṣṭhā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1006: RV_4,043.04a kā vām bhūd upamātiḥ kayā na āśvinā gamatho hūyamānā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1007: RV_4,043.04c ko vām mahaś cit tyajaso abhīka uruṣyatam mādhvī dasrā na ūtī ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1008: RV_4,043.05a uru vāṃ rathaḥ pari nakṣati dyām ā yat samudrād abhi vartate vām |
GV01rv_hn04u:1009: RV_4,043.05c madhvā mādhvī madhu vām pruṣāyan yat sīṃ vām pṛkṣo bhurajanta pakvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1010: RV_4,043.06a sindhur ha vāṃ rasayā siñcad aśvān ghṛṇā vayo 'ruṣāsaḥ pari gman |
GV01rv_hn04u:1011: RV_4,043.06c tad ū ṣu vām ajiraṃ ceti yānaṃ yena patī bhavathaḥ sūryāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1012: RV_4,043.07a iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1013: RV_4,043.07c uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1014: RV_4,044.01a taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema pṛthujrayam aśvinā saṃgatiṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:1016: RV_4,044.01c yaḥ sūryāṃ vahati vandhurāyur girvāhasam purutamaṃ vasūyum ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1017: RV_4,044.02a yuvaṃ śriyam aśvinā devatā tāṃ divo napātā vanathaḥ śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1018: RV_4,044.02c yuvor vapur abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante vahanti yat kakuhāso rathe
GV01rv_hn04u:1020: RV_4,044.03a ko vām adyā karate rātahavya ūtaye vā sutapeyāya vārkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1021: RV_4,044.03c ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namo yemāno aśvinā vavartat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1022: RV_4,044.04a hiraṇyayena purubhū rathenemaṃ yajñaṃ nāsatyopa yātam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1023: RV_4,044.04c pibātha in madhunaḥ somyasya dadhatho ratnaṃ vidhate janāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1024: RV_4,044.05a ā no yātaṃ divo acchā pṛthivyā hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena |
GV01rv_hn04u:1025: RV_4,044.05c mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ saṃ yad dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1026: RV_4,044.06a nū no rayim puruvīram bṛhantaṃ dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣv asme |
GV01rv_hn04u:1027: RV_4,044.06c naro yad vām aśvinā stomam āvan sadhastutim ājamīḷhāso agman
GV01rv_hn04u:1028: RV_4,044.07a iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1029: RV_4,044.07c uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1030: RV_4,045.01a eṣa sya bhānur ud iyarti yujyate rathaḥ parijmā divo asya sānavi |
GV01rv_hn04u:1031: RV_4,045.01c pṛkṣāso asmin mithunā adhi trayo dṛtis turīyo madhuno vi
GV01rv_hn04u:1033: RV_4,045.02a ud vām pṛkṣāso madhumanta īrate rathā aśvāsa uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:1034: RV_4,045.02c aporṇuvantas tama ā parīvṛtaṃ svar ṇa śukraṃ tanvanta ā rajaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1035: RV_4,045.03a madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhir uta priyam madhune yuñjāthāṃ ratham |
GV01rv_hn04u:1036: RV_4,045.03c ā vartanim madhunā jinvathas patho dṛtiṃ vahethe madhumantam aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1037: RV_4,045.04a haṃsāso ye vām madhumanto asridho hiraṇyaparṇā uhuva uṣarbudhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1038: RV_4,045.04c udapruto mandino mandinispṛśo madhvo na makṣaḥ savanāni gacchathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1039: RV_4,045.05a svadhvarāso madhumanto agnaya usrā jarante prati vastor aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1040: RV_4,045.05c yan niktahastas taraṇir vicakṣaṇaḥ somaṃ suṣāva madhumantam adribhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1041: RV_4,045.06a ākenipāso ahabhir davidhvataḥ svar ṇa śukraṃ tanvanta ā rajaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1042: RV_4,045.06c sūraś cid aśvān yuyujāna īyate viśvāṃ anu svadhayā cetathas
GV01rv_hn04u:1044: RV_4,045.07a pra vām avocam aśvinā dhiyandhā rathaḥ svaśvo ajaro yo asti |
GV01rv_hn04u:1045: RV_4,045.07c yena sadyaḥ pari rajāṃsi yātho haviṣmantaṃ taraṇim bhojam accha ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1046: RV_4,046.01a agram pibā madhūnāṃ sutaṃ vāyo diviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:1048: RV_4,046.02a śatenā no abhiṣṭibhir niyutvāṃ indrasārathiḥ |
