GV01rv_hn04u:1050: RV_4,046.03a ā vāṃ sahasraṃ haraya indravāyū abhi prayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1054: RV_4,046.05a rathena pṛthupājasā dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1056: RV_4,046.06a indravāyū ayaṃ sutas taṃ devebhiḥ sajoṣasā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1058: RV_4,046.07a iha prayāṇam astu vām indravāyū vimocanam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1060: RV_4,047.01a vāyo śukro ayāmi te madhvo agraṃ diviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:1061: RV_4,047.01c ā yāhi somapītaye spārho deva niyutvatā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1062: RV_4,047.02a indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ somānām pītim arhathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1063: RV_4,047.02c yuvāṃ hi yantīndavo nimnam āpo na sadhryak ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1064: RV_4,047.03a vāyav indraś ca śuṣmiṇā sarathaṃ śavasas patī |
GV01rv_hn04u:1065: RV_4,047.03c niyutvantā na ūtaya ā yātaṃ somapītaye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1066: RV_4,047.04a yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1067: RV_4,047.04c asme tā yajñavāhasendravāyū ni yacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1068: RV_4,048.01a vihi hotrā avītā vipo na rāyo aryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1069: RV_4,048.01c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1071: RV_4,048.02c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1072: RV_4,048.03a anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī yemāte viśvapeśasā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1073: RV_4,048.03c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1074: RV_4,048.04a vahantu tvā manoyujo yuktāso navatir nava |
GV01rv_hn04u:1075: RV_4,048.04c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1076: RV_4,048.05a vāyo śataṃ harīṇāṃ yuvasva poṣyāṇām |
GV01rv_hn04u:1077: RV_4,048.05c uta vā te sahasriṇo ratha ā yātu pājasā ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1078: RV_4,049.01a idaṃ vām āsye haviḥ priyam indrābṛhaspatī |
GV01rv_hn04u:1080: RV_4,049.02a ayaṃ vām pari ṣicyate soma indrābṛhaspatī |
GV01rv_hn04u:1082: RV_4,049.03a ā na indrābṛhaspatī gṛham indraś ca gacchatam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1084: RV_4,049.04a asme indrābṛhaspatī rayiṃ dhattaṃ śatagvinam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1086: RV_4,049.05a indrābṛhaspatī vayaṃ sute gīrbhir havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn04u:1088: RV_4,049.06a somam indrābṛhaspatī pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe |
GV01rv_hn04u:1090: RV_4,050.01a yas tastambha sahasā vi jmo antān bṛhaspatis triṣadhastho raveṇa |
GV01rv_hn04u:1091: RV_4,050.01c tam pratnāsa ṛṣayo dīdhyānāḥ puro viprā dadhire mandrajihvam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1092: RV_4,050.02a dhunetayaḥ supraketam madanto bṛhaspate abhi ye nas tatasre |
GV01rv_hn04u:1093: RV_4,050.02c pṛṣantaṃ sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatād asya yonim ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1094: RV_4,050.03a bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvad ata ā ta ṛtaspṛśo ni ṣeduḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1095: RV_4,050.03c tubhyaṃ khātā avatā adridugdhā madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1096: RV_4,050.04a bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman |
GV01rv_hn04u:1097: RV_4,050.04c saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1098: RV_4,050.05a sa suṣṭubhā sa ṛkvatā gaṇena valaṃ ruroja phaligaṃ raveṇa |
GV01rv_hn04u:1099: RV_4,050.05c bṛhaspatir usriyā havyasūdaḥ kanikradad vāvaśatīr ud ājat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1100: RV_4,050.06a evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1101: RV_4,050.06c bṛhaspate suprajā vīravanto vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1102: RV_4,050.07a sa id rājā pratijanyāni viśvā śuṣmeṇa tasthāv abhi vīryeṇa |
GV01rv_hn04u:1103: RV_4,050.07c bṛhaspatiṃ yaḥ subhṛtam bibharti valgūyati vandate
GV01rv_hn04u:1105: RV_4,050.08a sa it kṣeti sudhita okasi sve tasmā iḷā pinvate viśvadānīm |
GV01rv_hn04u:1106: RV_4,050.08c tasmai viśaḥ svayam evā namante yasmin brahmā rājani pūrva
GV01rv_hn04u:1108: RV_4,050.09a apratīto jayati saṃ dhanāni pratijanyāny uta yā sajanyā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1109: RV_4,050.09c avasyave yo varivaḥ kṛṇoti brahmaṇe rājā tam avanti devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1110: RV_4,050.10a indraś ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate 'smin yajñe mandasānā vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn04u:1111: RV_4,050.10c ā vāṃ viśantv indavaḥ svābhuvo 'sme rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni
GV01rv_hn04u:1113: RV_4,050.11a bṛhaspata indra vardhataṃ naḥ sacā sā vāṃ sumatir bhūtv asme
GV01rv_hn04u:1114: RV_4,050.11c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1115: RV_4,051.01a idam u tyat purutamam purastāj jyotis tamaso vayunāvad asthāt
GV01rv_hn04u:1116: RV_4,051.01c nūnaṃ divo duhitaro vibhātīr gātuṃ kṛṇavann uṣaso janāya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1117: RV_4,051.02a asthur u citrā uṣasaḥ purastān mitā iva svaravo 'dhvareṣu |
GV01rv_hn04u:1118: RV_4,051.02c vy ū vrajasya tamaso dvārocchantīr avrañ chucayaḥ pāvakāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1119: RV_4,051.03a ucchantīr adya citayanta bhojān rādhodeyāyoṣaso maghonīḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1120: RV_4,051.03c acitre antaḥ paṇayaḥ sasantv abudhyamānās tamaso vimadhye ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1121: RV_4,051.04a kuvit sa devīḥ sanayo navo vā yāmo babhūyād uṣaso vo adya |
GV01rv_hn04u:1122: RV_4,051.04c yenā navagve aṅgire daśagve saptāsye revatī revad ūṣa ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1123: RV_4,051.05a yūyaṃ hi devīr ṛtayugbhir aśvaiḥ pariprayātha bhuvanāni sadyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1124: RV_4,051.05c prabodhayantīr uṣasaḥ sasantaṃ dvipāc catuṣpāc carathāya
GV01rv_hn04u:1126: RV_4,051.06a kva svid āsāṃ katamā purāṇī yayā vidhānā vidadhur ṛbhūṇām |
GV01rv_hn04u:1127: RV_4,051.06c śubhaṃ yac chubhrā uṣasaś caranti na vi jñāyante sadṛśīr
GV01rv_hn04u:1129: RV_4,051.07a tā ghā tā bhadrā uṣasaḥ purāsur abhiṣṭidyumnā ṛtajātasatyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1130: RV_4,051.07c yāsv ījānaḥ śaśamāna ukthai stuvañ chaṃsan draviṇaṃ sadya āpa
GV01rv_hn04u:1131: RV_4,051.08a tā ā caranti samanā purastāt samānataḥ samanā paprathānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1132: RV_4,051.08c ṛtasya devīḥ sadaso budhānā gavāṃ na sargā uṣaso jarante ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1133: RV_4,051.09a tā in nv eva samanā samānīr amītavarṇā uṣasaś caranti |
GV01rv_hn04u:1134: RV_4,051.09c gūhantīr abhvam asitaṃ ruśadbhiḥ śukrās tanūbhiḥ śucayo rucānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1135: RV_4,051.10a rayiṃ divo duhitaro vibhātīḥ prajāvantaṃ yacchatāsmāsu devīḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1136: RV_4,051.10c syonād ā vaḥ pratibudhyamānāḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1137: RV_4,051.11a tad vo divo duhitaro vibhātīr upa bruva uṣaso yajñaketuḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1138: RV_4,051.11c vayaṃ syāma yaśaso janeṣu tad dyauś ca dhattām pṛthivī ca devī ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1139: RV_4,052.01a prati ṣyā sūnarī janī vyucchantī pari svasuḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1141: RV_4,052.02a aśveva citrāruṣī mātā gavām ṛtāvarī |
GV01rv_hn04u:1143: RV_4,052.03a uta sakhāsy aśvinor uta mātā gavām asi |
GV01rv_hn04u:1147: RV_4,052.05a prati bhadrā adṛkṣata gavāṃ sargā na raśmayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1149: RV_4,052.06a āpapruṣī vibhāvari vy āvar jyotiṣā tamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1151: RV_4,052.07a ā dyāṃ tanoṣi raśmibhir āntarikṣam uru priyam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1153: RV_4,053.01a tad devasya savitur vāryam mahad vṛṇīmahe asurasya pracetasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1154: RV_4,053.01c chardir yena dāśuṣe yacchati tmanā tan no mahāṃ ud ayān devo aktubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1155: RV_4,053.02a divo dhartā bhuvanasya prajāpatiḥ piśaṅgaṃ drāpim prati muñcate kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1156: RV_4,053.02c vicakṣaṇaḥ prathayann āpṛṇann urv ajījanat savitā sumnam ukthyam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1157: RV_4,053.03a āprā rajāṃsi divyāni pārthivā ślokaṃ devaḥ kṛṇute svāya dharmaṇe |
GV01rv_hn04u:1158: RV_4,053.03c pra bāhū asrāk savitā savīmani niveśayan prasuvann aktubhir jagat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1159: RV_4,053.04a adābhyo bhuvanāni pracākaśad vratāni devaḥ savitābhi rakṣate
GV01rv_hn04u:1160: RV_4,053.04c prāsrāg bāhū bhuvanasya prajābhyo dhṛtavrato maho ajmasya rājati ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1161: RV_4,053.05a trir antarikṣaṃ savitā mahitvanā trī rajāṃsi paribhus trīṇi rocanā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1162: RV_4,053.05c tisro divaḥ pṛthivīs tisra invati tribhir vratair abhi no
GV01rv_hn04u:1164: RV_4,053.06a bṛhatsumnaḥ prasavītā niveśano jagata sthātur ubhayasya yo vaśī |
GV01rv_hn04u:1165: RV_4,053.06c sa no devaḥ savitā śarma yacchatv asme kṣayāya trivarūtham
GV01rv_hn04u:1167: RV_4,053.07a āgan deva ṛtubhir vardhatu kṣayaṃ dadhātu naḥ savitā suprajām
GV01rv_hn04u:1169: RV_4,053.07c sa naḥ kṣapābhir ahabhiś ca jinvatu prajāvantaṃ rayim asme
GV01rv_hn04u:1171: RV_4,054.01a abhūd devaḥ savitā vandyo nu na idānīm ahna upavācyo nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1172: RV_4,054.01c vi yo ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ no atra draviṇaṃ
GV01rv_hn04u:1174: RV_4,054.02a devebhyo hi prathamaṃ yajñiyebhyo 'mṛtatvaṃ suvasi bhāgam uttamam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1175: RV_4,054.02c ād id dāmānaṃ savitar vy ūrṇuṣe 'nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1176: RV_4,054.03a acittī yac cakṛmā daivye jane dīnair dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1177: RV_4,054.03c deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca tvaṃ no atra suvatād anāgasaḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1178: RV_4,054.04a na pramiye savitur daivyasya tad yathā viśvam bhuvanaṃ dhārayiṣyati |
GV01rv_hn04u:1179: RV_4,054.04c yat pṛthivyā varimann ā svaṅgurir varṣman divaḥ suvati satyam
GV01rv_hn04u:1181: RV_4,054.05a indrajyeṣṭhān bṛhadbhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ kṣayāṃ ebhyaḥ suvasi
GV01rv_hn04u:1183: RV_4,054.05c yathā-yathā patayanto viyemira evaiva tasthuḥ savitaḥ savāya
GV01rv_hn04u:1185: RV_4,054.06a ye te trir ahan savitaḥ savāso dive-dive saubhagam āsuvanti |
GV01rv_hn04u:1186: RV_4,054.06c indro dyāvāpṛthivī sindhur adbhir ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1187: RV_4,055.01a ko vas trātā vasavaḥ ko varūtā dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ naḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1188: RV_4,055.01c sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martāt ko vo 'dhvare varivo dhāti devāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1189: RV_4,055.02a pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇy arcān vi yad ucchān viyotāro amūrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1190: RV_4,055.02c vidhātāro vi te dadhur ajasrā ṛtadhītayo rurucanta dasmāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1191: RV_4,055.03a pra pastyām aditiṃ sindhum arkaiḥ svastim īḷe sakhyāya devīm
GV01rv_hn04u:1192: RV_4,055.03c ubhe yathā no ahanī nipāta uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1193: RV_4,055.04a vy aryamā varuṇaś ceti panthām iṣas patiḥ suvitaṃ gātum agniḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1194: RV_4,055.04c indrāviṣṇū nṛvad u ṣu stavānā śarma no yantam amavad varūtham
GV01rv_hn04u:1195: RV_4,055.05a ā parvatasya marutām avāṃsi devasya trātur avri bhagasya |
GV01rv_hn04u:1196: RV_4,055.05c pāt patir janyād aṃhaso no mitro mitriyād uta na uruṣyet ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1197: RV_4,055.06a nū rodasī ahinā budhnyena stuvīta devī apyebhir iṣṭaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1198: RV_4,055.06c samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavo gharmasvaraso nadyo apa vran ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1199: RV_4,055.07a devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām
GV01rv_hn04u:1201: RV_4,055.07c nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim arhāmasi pramiyaṃ sānv agneḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1202: RV_4,055.08a agnir īśe vasavyasyāgnir mahaḥ saubhagasya |
GV01rv_hn04u:1204: RV_4,055.09a uṣo maghony ā vaha sūnṛte vāryā puru |
GV01rv_hn04u:1206: RV_4,055.10a tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1208: RV_4,056.01a mahī dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭhe rucā bhavatāṃ śucayadbhir arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1209: RV_4,056.01c yat sīṃ variṣṭhe bṛhatī viminvan ruvad dhokṣā paprathānebhir evaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1210: RV_4,056.02a devī devebhir yajate yajatrair aminatī tasthatur ukṣamāṇe |
GV01rv_hn04u:1211: RV_4,056.02c ṛtāvarī adruhā devaputre yajñasya netrī śucayadbhir arkaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1212: RV_4,056.03a sa it svapā bhuvaneṣv āsa ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna |
GV01rv_hn04u:1213: RV_4,056.03c urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke avaṃśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1214: RV_4,056.04a nū rodasī bṛhadbhir no varūthaiḥ patnīvadbhir iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1215: RV_4,056.04c urūcī viśve yajate ni pātaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1216: RV_4,056.05a pra vām mahi dyavī abhy upastutim bharāmahe |
GV01rv_hn04u:1218: RV_4,056.06a punāne tanvā mithaḥ svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1220: RV_4,056.07a mahī mitrasya sādhathas tarantī pipratī ṛtam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1222: RV_4,057.01a kṣetrasya patinā vayaṃ hiteneva jayāmasi |
GV01rv_hn04u:1223: RV_4,057.01c gām aśvam poṣayitnv ā sa no mṛḷātīdṛśe ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1224: RV_4,057.02a kṣetrasya pate madhumantam ūrmiṃ dhenur iva payo asmāsu dhukṣva |
GV01rv_hn04u:1225: RV_4,057.02c madhuścutaṃ ghṛtam iva supūtam ṛtasya naḥ patayo mṛḷayantu ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1226: RV_4,057.03a madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāva āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1227: RV_4,057.03c kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1228: RV_4,057.04a śunaṃ vāhāḥ śunaṃ naraḥ śunaṃ kṛṣatu lāṅgalam |
GV01rv_hn04u:1229: RV_4,057.04c śunaṃ varatrā badhyantāṃ śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1230: RV_4,057.05a śunāsīrāv imāṃ vācaṃ juṣethāṃ yad divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1232: RV_4,057.06a arvācī subhage bhava sīte vandāmahe tvā |
GV01rv_hn04u:1233: RV_4,057.06c yathā naḥ subhagāsasi yathā naḥ suphalāsasi ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1234: RV_4,057.07a indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣānu yacchatu |
GV01rv_hn04u:1235: RV_4,057.07c sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām-uttarāṃ samām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1236: RV_4,057.08a śunaṃ naḥ phālā vi kṛṣantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśā abhi yantu vāhaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1237: RV_4,057.08c śunam parjanyo madhunā payobhiḥ śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1238: RV_4,058.01a samudrād ūrmir madhumāṃ ud ārad upāṃśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaṭ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1239: RV_4,058.01c ghṛtasya nāma guhyaṃ yad asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1240: RV_4,058.02a vayaṃ nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasyāsmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1241: RV_4,058.02c upa brahmā śṛṇavac chasyamānaṃ catuḥśṛṅgo 'vamīd gaura etat ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1242: RV_4,058.03a catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya |
GV01rv_hn04u:1243: RV_4,058.03c tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1244: RV_4,058.04a tridhā hitam paṇibhir guhyamānaṃ gavi devāso ghṛtam anv avindan |
GV01rv_hn04u:1245: RV_4,058.04c indra ekaṃ sūrya ekaṃ jajāna venād ekaṃ svadhayā niṣ ṭatakṣuḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1246: RV_4,058.05a etā arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāc chatavrajā ripuṇā nāvacakṣe |
GV01rv_hn04u:1247: RV_4,058.05c ghṛtasya dhārā abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayo vetaso madhya āsām ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1248: RV_4,058.06a samyak sravanti sarito na dhenā antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn04u:1249: RV_4,058.06c ete arṣanty ūrmayo ghṛtasya mṛgā iva kṣipaṇor īṣamāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1250: RV_4,058.07a sindhor iva prādhvane śūghanāso vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ
GV01rv_hn04u:1251: RV_4,058.07c ghṛtasya dhārā aruṣo na vājī kāṣṭhā bhindann ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1252: RV_4,058.08a abhi pravanta samaneva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāso agnim |
GV01rv_hn04u:1253: RV_4,058.08c ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidho nasanta tā juṣāṇo haryati jātavedāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn04u:1254: RV_4,058.09a kanyā iva vahatum etavā u añjy añjānā abhi cākaśīmi |
GV01rv_hn04u:1255: RV_4,058.09c yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajño ghṛtasya dhārā abhi tat
GV01rv_hn04u:1257: RV_4,058.10a abhy arṣata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta |
GV01rv_hn04u:1258: RV_4,058.10c imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavante
GV01rv_hn04u:1259: RV_4,058.11a dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam antaḥ samudre hṛdy
GV01rv_hn04u:1261: RV_4,058.11c apām anīke samithe ya ābhṛtas tam aśyāma madhumantaṃ ta ūrmim
